reviews.review_title: A Simply Outstanding Fairy-Tale Love Saga With A Burning Heart Laced By Brilliant Background Score !!!
reviews.content: Story by Hanu Raghavapudi, Sita Ramam is like a fairy tale. In 1985, Afreen (Rashmika Mandanna) is a Pakistani rabble-rouser studying in London who is set in her ways and harbours an intense dislike for anything and everything Indian. She might be from the other side of the border but her feelings mirror that of youngsters on this side of the border even today. Early on in the film she's told that the solution for her misplaced anger is love, a notion she brushes off as the sayings of an old man. But when she begrudgingly decides to deliver a lost letter to India, she's transported back to 1964 where the poetic love story of Lt. Ram (Dulquer Salmaan) and Sita Mahalakhsmi (Mrunal Thakur) unfolds. He is an orphan; she is a woman with a secret she can't reveal. Even as Afreen and her begrudging partner-in-crime Balaji (Tharun Bhascker) learn everything there is to known about Sita and Ram, she might end up learning a lesson or two along the way.On the surface Sita Ramam is nothing more than the love story of two people from different worlds falling in love while writing letters to each other. But dig beneath all the opulence, old-school glamour, beautiful clothes, VFX butterflies and extravagant sets, you find a story that has its heart set in humanity and love.Hanu does a good job of showing, instead of preaching, how irrespective of what god you pray to and what country you belong to, it's only humanity that matters at the end of the day. Even as not everyone in the armies on both sides of the border believe this, Ram and Major Tariq (Sachin Khedekar) inadvertently set off a butterfly effect with their empathy that doesn't just touch numerous lives, it even leaves them better off. And beyond that, Sita and Ram do have a love story that makes you want to root for them.Dulquer Salman and Mrunal Thakur steal the show in Sita Ramam. For a film like this to work, you need to be invested in their story and the actors do a good job in ensuring that. They breathe life into their characters and it doesn't hurt that Mrunal looks breath-taking in the film. Rashmika, Tharun, Sachin and Sumanth do a good enough job while Vennela Kishore and Murli Sharma are a hoot.A lot of able actors from Priyadarshi and Rahul Ravindran to Tinu Anand and Gautam Vasudev Menon make short appearances that work well for the film. PS Vinod, Shreyaas Krishna's cinematography and Vishal Chandrasekhar's music truly aid in bringing the world of Sita Ramam to life. But a special shoutout must be given to art director Irfan Rashid Sheikh and costume designer Sheetal Sharma for transporting the audience so seamlessly to the 60s and 80s.On the whole Sita Ramam is a beautiful love story. The film has a decent first half and great second half. The scintillating performances by all the lead cast, the pleasing narrative, and the poetic writing will make you poignant and heartwarming. As the film is centered around a simple love story and war, it may not be overwhelming to the masses. Almost all the departments did a superlative job. Director Hanu gave us a beautiful and aesthetic love story that should surely be enjoyed on big screens. You can surely watch this film without a doubt. It is worth all your money.

This movie is beautifully made and deserves to receive more acclaim. Whoever doesn't like this movie can consider themselves as not a movie lover.BGM and songs take this masterpiece to whole different level. A big applause to entire unit and special kudos to director.

Been watching a LOT of Indian movies specifically Telugu language ones lately--many of them surprisingly good, but this one was only so-so. As melodramatic love stories go, this one stays pretty close to form. I like the premise--a soldier (Ram) receives letters from the mysterious Sita claiming to be his wife. But this one does very little different from expectation--there are echoes of The Notebook and pretty much every well-known love story including Roman Holiday. But while the latter remains a delicious vignette in a princess's life, Sita Ramam drags it out and overstays its welcome. Is it watchable? Sure. But ultimately forgettable.

Golly I'm lost for words as I didn't expect the Hanu Raghavapudi directed DQ, Mrunal and Rashmika starrer Sita Ramam to be such a beautiful and poignant love story. It's better than Ok Kanmani and Charlie combined, take it from me 😁. I think what works for the film beyond the grand scale at which it's mounted is how lovable the central characters are. Their chemistry sizzles and they both sparkle on screen, so everything around them naturally becomes appealing. From the moment Rashmika, who plays an extended cameo, decides to take the plunge and help herself by helping Ram and Sita, we know Sita Ramam could become everything that Radhe Shyam promised. Each frame is like a therapy for sore eyes, such is the brilliant cinematography. Although the songs are just hummable, the BGM is truly soul stirring and there are so many epic moments in both halves that I probably need to watch this film again just to revel in them. Hanu had given a flop in his previous film Padi Padi Lechu Manasu, which although was good, was also a little overdone. So credit to DQ and Mrunal for trusting the maker in him and giving us such a poetic love story. There is also a very intelligently woven subplot featuring the fight against Pak supported Mujhahideen. The cowardice of the countries that decided to ban the film is truly astonishing though. About the lead pair: Mrunal is gorgeous and her costume designer deserves every accolade in the book. She slips into the role of Sita so easily that you really can't take your eyes off her. Dulquer brings his career best performance in the role of soldier Ram and his honest performance will leave many teary eyed. I thought he's going through an identity crisis of sorts but hell no, Sita Ramam is the best decision he's made till date. The fact that its Malayalam version was almost full in a theatre in London and that the film's growing organically among the buffs, show there's something there. Sita Ramam is not just another love story, it's an emotional, epic and eternal tale of unanswered and unfulfilled love that's sure to last the test of times and leave everyone watching, supremely satisfied.

reviews.review_title: A love story told through breath-taking landscapes!
reviews.content: It has been a while since I got to watch a 'love story' love story. You know, the epic saga kind of love story. And I enjoyed it! It did require one to suspend reality, and it is not a bad thing. The unrealism, in no way make this a bad movie. But, with the talented leads, a more realistic take would have propelled this movie to greater heights.The movie entirely rests on Dulquer and Mrunal! Dulquer plays Ram with so much ease, and is so convincing. Everyone would want a Ram in their life. Mrunal, apart from looking gorgeous in every frame, played Sita with great conviction. Their chemistry worked and you just wish for them to stay together forever and ever.The movie felt a little draggy. I understand, that the writers might have wanted to take time in developing the relationship of the protagonists. To get us more attached to seeing them together, which raises the impact of the post-interval scenes. It does work, but as I said earlier, the treatment and sequence of events to and post the meeting of our protagonists is told through a fantasy-ish lens. It was an entertaining watch, but it did not stay with me for too long after I left the theatre.The cinematography was magical. I would watch this for the scenery alone. The gorgeous landscaped captured so masterfully by the cinematographer, adds the required hyper-realism to the story.I just wish the movie had better songs. Usually, such love stories thrive on having powerful numbers, which were absent here.Overall, I enjoyed it, although I believe the movie could have been so much more!

I loved every minute of movie, everything in this movie is 10/10. This is the best movie, I have watched. Direction, production, acting, story all are masterpiece. Beautiful love story

Please do watch it if you are into love stories you'll never regret.. There are some people who are writing negative reviews...I think they didn't even watch this movie.. Please write review after watching...I am again saying
Must watch must watch and must watch.

Sita Ramam, this Tollywood dubbed movie competes the length of Ramayan that used to get aired in Doordarshan decades ago . The movie goes on like a Duracell battery, on and on and on and by the time it was nearing end , a slight feel of uneasiness arises if there would be a sequel to this movie , thankfully the possibility faded away completely by last scene giving us some good breathing moment . Dulquer from Mollywood and Mrunal from Bollywood comes together to make a movie in Tollywood . The storyline was actually good and sure a movie content , however the director failed to notice the bubble gum effect and let the movie stretch for miles together, particularly the first half . Public comment was the movie had shades of Veer Zara, though I don't remember seeing that one in the past . The lead actors including Rashmika Mandana given the experience in this industry didn't fail to strike a good performance. Music just didn't get registered in mind . Cinematography was good and the screen was pleasant and colorful in many reels . First half was complete chaos and second half was much better and did end well resting everyone's mind in peace . People in UAE in a way would be happy that this movie is banned over there . One (long)time watch and cannot really recommend a theatre watch needing long sitting . Fitness watches would have definitely had a frozen screen image saying "really a high time to stand and move on". Overall , Sita Ramam, Miles of reels to go before we sleep.

I have seen a lot of romance movies in 2022. I thought that this movie also will be one of them. But, My inference was wrong. It's a classic love story. Dulquer Salman's and Mrunal Thakur's acting
and their chemistry were perfect. This is the best film that I have watched ever. Usually, I have not got emotional like this when I watched movies. It's a very emotional and heart-touching movie this is real love. Love is an amazing thing that exists in the world. Love can change anything. I felt it. Thanks, everyone for creating this masterpiece. Keep it up. I invite all of you to watch this movie. Every love has not a happy ending.

Rashmika Mandanna; been her fan since Geeta Govinda and Dear Comrade.3. Mrunal Thakur; Yeah! She's a cute actor and did a great job in her movies like Super 30, Batla House and many more.Getting back to the point, I got lost in the plot and it was not anymore about just the casting but the story. The first half is pleasant where you get to know about the characters but the second half contains a heavy load of emotions.If you are thinking to watch it, go watch it and I'm sure you won't regret it. reviews.review_title: Come fall in Love with Love
reviews.content: Come fall in Love with LoveIt makes you fall in love with love. The innocence and purity of love which is missing in now a days romance movies is brought back. You feel joyous, elated, sad and at times you are blushing as well while watching it. Imagine that pure and sweet feeling of love that makes you feel your heart is full to overflowing with the effervescent emotions it evokes. The movie is about that love. How ever far they are, Raam and Seetha will always unite as only they can complete each other. Rather than becoming decrepit, she celebrates her love along with fulfilling her goals and duties.#copied,

Hanu Raghavapudi looks at world in wide frames and they almost resemble Mani Ratnam's at times. Destructive love stories are difficult and Ratnam is the boss of the genre, but Hanu manages to almost win this battle with a good score. He creates a fairyland and hits you with a tragedy in the same and that does work well. You feel joyous, elated, sad and at times you are blushing as well while watching it. Imagine that pure and sweet feeling of love that makes you feel your heart is full to overflowing with the effervescent emotions it evokes. The movie is about that love. It also shows that when you have your heart and soul filled with that love and those memories, your life still goes on as that is what your love wants for you. How ever far they are, Ram and Seeta will always unite as only they can complete each other. No love story is complete without soulful music and eternal lyrics which was abundantly present and such perfect rendition of the songs by the singers that all the songs are going to become melodies. But chemistry between hero and heroine is not upto mark, looks very immature and lacks to convince there is great love between them.

Sita Ramam review :A sweet and warm love story cleverly packaged with cross border politics as well as Hindu Muslim angle; Sita Ramam is generally a satisfying watch though it could've been trimmed by ten to fifteen minutes.. never mind!Oscillating from 1964 to mid '80s, the screenplay highlights the love story of an army officer Ram (Dulquer Salman) and a mystery woman called Sita Mahalaxmi. This '60s romance is uncovered by Afreen (Rashmika Mandanna) whose grandfather, a brigadier in Pak army, wills her to deliver Ram's love letter to Sita twenty years too late. Why would he do that and how does he know Ram-Sita? All these questions are answered slowly and steadily through the two hours forty minutes of movietime.The biggest plus point of Sita Ramam are its likeable characters specially the lead pair of Dulquer and Mrunal. They not only look great as a pair but also deliver wonderful performances. You truly root for the two to come together even as they battle all kinds of odds. Rashmika, billed as a special appearance, has an interesting role of a feisty Pakistani woman who discovers herself during the process of delivering a letter in India.The situations are engaging as well as thought provoking and a couple of scenes truly touch your heart. Like Dulquer going to meet his pen-friend turned sister and on realizing she is trapped in flesh trade, rescues her and many others from the brothel. Another memorable moment comes when Mrunal falls at the feet of an Army Major and begs and pleads about Ram.Techinically, Sita Ramam is a winner with excellent locales and cinematography to compliment the soulful music. Its definitely a treat to watch.Anything negative then?, you may ask. Well, for one is the sluggish pace in the first half. Second and more important is a plot point which suggests Indian Army to be deserting their own soldiers in difficult times. And last but not the least is the climax which brings back memories of Yash Chopra's mellow-shallow drama Veer Zaara (2004). Yikes!All said and endured, I would recommend Sita Ramam as a one time watch.Regards,
Sumeet Nadkarni.

In 1984 London, an aggressive Pakistani student afreen(rashmika), burns the car of an indian philanthropist anand mehta(tinnu anand) for retribution of the burning of Pakistan flag. Her college dean insists her to either apologize to him or pay inr 10 million as compensation to avoid going to prison. Afreen refuses to apologize and returns to Pakistan in order to get the compensation amount from her grandfather brigadier abu tariq(sachin khedekar). But after returning she finds out that he passed away and his lawyer reveals to her that she will get her share only if she gives a letter written by indian lieutenant ram (DQ) to sita(mrunal thakur) in India. Rest of the film is afreen's journey to give the letter and find about ram and sita's love story.As a romantic film, sita ramam is everything what radhe shyam was supposed to be. Its gorgeous looking with two charming lead pair with beautiful chemistry and while watching them audience develop the feeling of them to never get seperated. DQ was extremely lovable as ram. He looked more handsome in the rugged prisoner look in the final act than the otherwise clean soldier look. Initially, the makers wanted to cast pooja hegde as sita but thank god she didn't because she would have never been as graceful as mrunal thakur. This film has an ensemble supporting cast from tamil,telugu and hindi industry making it a pan indian star cast.On the flipside, various subplots highly smells of mediocrity. Infact the actual love scenes only begins after the first 50 minutes. Also there is a sense of dejavu while watching sita ramam as it reminds you of films like ghajini and veer zaara.On the whole, sita ramam is a heartouching epic and beautiful love story.

Not even worth for 5 paisa..Cringe romantic story with below average direction, poor dialogue delivery, cringe comedy.... frustrated I got out of the theatre after the interval...Thanks for giving me a headache...
Dulquer totally lost his acting skills and his artificiality in acting was clearly visible...poor dubbing made it even worse
1/10.

What a fabulous love story this is , such innocence with great love and pride.i enjoyed every bit of movie.starting from ram till Sita. Excellent dialogues beautiful music and acting best of the best just enjoyed each emotional scene with watery eyes.breathtaking scenes in terms of love.no lust pure love 💕 that's the beauty of this movie . Never written any review before but this movie forced me to write 600 characters and I want to write those because this movie deserve this love and appreciation from audience.definitely watch this movie it will make you love again remember love again and most importantly you will fall in love with this movie.

Though it's a love story, but lacks all the aspects of a good film. Good film needs a good story, direction, screen play, acting and good dialogue. I am not sure why Telugu film industry is so much obsessed with actors speaking in English. It's doesn't go well. In one of the dialogue, the brother of Noorjehan says 'its a fake news' - looks like the dialogue writer was carried away by what's happening in recent times with fake news.Sita Ramam is Veer Zaara minus soul, minus heart, minus life, minus everything, just bland. Skip it and watch Veer Zaara again.

reviews.review_title: Factually inaccurate. No story and shows an anti national underttone
reviews.content:
I was shocked watching this movie yesterday on how can zero research be done. So so many blaring errors.1. Shoot locations in Ladakh that are being called Kashmir
2. A Pakistani woman is walking around in India and meeting top army officials for researching her book and she gets open access to Indian Army records
3. Madras regiment has south Indian officers and Sardar soldiersBut what was the most shocking was the pro Pakistani Army and Anti Indian Army sentiment that is being peddled.The Pakistani Army is being shown as kind, peace loving and large headed.Whereas the Indian army is shown as a force that deserts it's soldiers. After the work is done it puts out press statements labeling it's soldiers as traitors. The Indian Army officers are shown as weak hearted who succumb to torture and sell national secrets.The Pakistani Army on the other hand is shown to uphold the Geneva convention and treat soldiers with dignity. There is a scene where a Pakistani General goes on to say that the Indian Army doesnt even know how to respect it's soldiers and dead!I am truly shocked at the anti India and pro Pakistani sentiment being sold here under the garb of a stupid love story that lacks any substance.

What is love between couple. Is it's sex,kiss or anything. No the love is emotion and felling. There is not even single kiss but it will define true love . The movie tell what is true love . I am very happy to watch this masterpiece . Last seen will make you emotional all of actors Play there character excellent. Slaman sir win my heart 💜 . He is true actor his expressions is full of love and describe how he loves Sita Laxmi. The movie is full of mystery and many more the song are also good no doubt no one can compare or make this type of movie even Hollywood also can't make this type of movie.

Movie starts slow and slowly grows on you, the cinematography is stunning and captures the beauty of kashmir which keeps you engageStory is fresh and have lot of twist that keeps your attention fresh, Acting is also very natural everyone acts natural no over or under acting, I can't comment on songs as I saw dubbed versions in Hindi.Ending was messy and felt like writer and director could not figure out nice ending so they went with sad ending which doesn't feel sincere and feels rushed for sake of emotional end.In conclusion the movie is fresh with new story and great visual and nice acting but feels short sighted 7/10.

Not exaggerating my opinion and keeping it simple;
Sita Ramam is just a beautiful story of simple and powerful love and yes even if our Sita and Rama don't get together (physically) at end but stilly emotionally and probably in another realm they are and will be together for their love is divine and eternal. No other actors would have been this perfect and lovable for the main cast roles as like Dulquer Salman and Mrunal Thakur .I would praise the director cum writer of the movie Hanu Raghavapudi for taking up issues like India Pakistan and Hindu Muslim so much effectively without causing any distress. The movie hasn't been a mess at all since the chronology of various events taking place are well arranged, and finally coming to music, its eternally aesthetic !!!

reviews.review_title: Veer Zaara spin off but with the sad endings
reviews.content: I could have rated it as 10 star. But the movie spoiled the ending part. They could have given happy ending like it happened in veer zaara. But they have given distrubing ending. Overall it is a Good movie but can't match the standard of veer zaara because of sad ending spoiled the movie. There was a movie kannada movie called dia. That was a beautiful movie, and it will take you in joyful ride but the ending, was so so distrubing. It will stay with you for months and months. When ever you will try to remember the ending. You will give you nightmare. This film followed the part of dia but not in extreme way.

This movie takes us back to the times where depiction of love and romance was a bit dreamy and filmy but nevertheless soothing and refreshing. Though the film does resemble Roja and Veer-Zaara in bits and pieces, only here and there, but it takes nothing away from the story, the screen-play and direction of this movie which makes this movie a one of its own. The movie for the first 15min or so feels quite fast-paced but that is for a good reason - to keep focus and attention to the romance between the protagonists, where most of the time and efforts were rightly spent.While the Hindi-dub was good, I am sure the actual Telugu version must have been better, with the dialogues and lyrics. This is quite natural with multi-lingual dubbed movies and totally fine by me.

Being brutally honest, Sita Ramam is largely a disappointing affair. The jokes don't land, the direction is abysmal, the screenplay is filled with glaring plotholes and overtly convenient tropes, the cinematography while ambitious leaves much to be desired. However, the saving grace for the film is its lead pair - specially Mrunal Thakur who is as good at looking ethereal as she is at delivering the grace and gravity of her character. Salmaan has done a decent job but it's his chemistry with Mrunal that brings the best out in him. Rashmika Mandana does fine with what she had been handed.The film's script is fine mostly because of the climax and the romantic plot but the screenplay is so poorly done - specially in the first half - that one would feel compelled to turn the movie off. Don't. It gets better afterwards as the romantic plot takes off, the music takes center stage and the plot twists and slapstick humor finally begin to land. At least for a little while.The director has done the film dirty. He is good in the romantic parts but is grossly underresearched and unconvincing in geopolitics as well as military sequences. He's also in a discomforting haste to get to the parts which seem to be his natural strengths.Overall, the film is an entertaining watch if one is able to turn a blind eye (impossible) to its many inadequacies. I am going with 6/10 for the music, climax, romance and Mrunal.

reviews.review_title: Sita Ramam perfect treat for your feelings
reviews.content: It's been a while since a love story narrates well in the cinema industry when Horror, mystery thriller action movies are performed well. The flow of love is more mesmeric with mrunal and Dulquer. Those music bgms and song placements were good. It takes you to a real love story where these kinds of love stories are rear now. Hats off for taking such a beautiful love story. I watched this movie 10 times but still, I couldn't take my heart from this love especially the "hey Rama song" and the climax sad song apart from those love scenes. I was waiting for this for a long time after kgf 2. But never thought that this would be an absolute love treat. Those who loved truly and sincerely will grab this movie like me. This is something special.

Purely a unique love story whole movie is so well written, directed and acting of both Dulquer and Mrunal is so just over the moon, love just keep floating around the whole movie but not just love movie has great message too regarding religion and Ind-Pak relations. Movie has great cinematography in specially Kashmir. Just one thing i didn't get was Sita after 20 years looked almost as young as she was earlier. These is my second movie in Telugu after Pushpa: The Rise well i have to use subtitle to understand but movies are about talent and art and man i'm blown away with Telugu talent keep it on guys.

reviews.review_title: Moview with convoluted plot with typical ending
reviews.content: A movie that promised so much at he start with soldier becoming the unlikely hero. While you think there is more to the movie in the Army Attires, sorry to say the it become just a crazy romantic movie.They seem to easily connect different scenes together as if there was a mystery being solved. Acting wise it was pretty ordinary by Rashmika who just seem to act arrogant and rash. Mrinal Thakur has done decent job with her role and Dulkar seem to be someone who seems to always have a smile, felt that the intensity was missing.Expected a lot out of movie from its build up and start-case but it was a disappointment. The ending was just terrible as the seem to make someone at such a high rank look bad. Someone compromising National security and continuing to serve, that act of treason unacceptable.Yes, if you want just relax and watch it. It can be watched with patience. Frankly, too much hype for movie and certainly not living up to expectation.

So refreshing to have not worried about my ear drums in a recent theater experience.That said, beautiful story, nice and pleasant screenplay.-2 for Rashmika's screen presence and cringey voice. Take her out and this would have been an instant classic.

reviews.review_title: Weaving the the threads of fate...
reviews.content: This movie started slow, not gonna lie, the love story bit was not for me when it began, but then you realize it is just a tiny speck in the overall story as you go on. Once the threads start revealing themselves you will realise this is not just a movie, this is art. After going through an hour of the love story and the military input, be patient and then the plot starts to reveal itself in all its Glory and by the time you finished watching, you would realize the writer and director have just connected both past and present and turned it to a timeless tale and what you would be left with is multiple stabs in your heart. Just go and watch this movie definitely one of the best romantic stories of 2022.

I was shocked watching this movie yesterday on how can zero research be done. So so many blaring errors.1. Shoot locations in Ladakh that are being called Kashmir
2. A Pakistani woman is walking around in India and meeting top army officials for researching her book and she gets open access to Indian Army records
3. Madras regiment has south Indian officers and Sardar soldiersBut what was the most shocking was the pro Pakistani Army and Anti Indian Army sentiment that is being peddled.The Pakistani Army is being shown as kind, peace loving and large headed.Whereas the Indian army is shown as a force that deserts it's soldiers. After the work is done it puts out press statements labeling it's soldiers as traitors. The Indian Army officers are shown as weak hearted who succumb to torture and sell national secrets.The Pakistani Army on the other hand is shown to uphold the Geneva convention and treat soldiers with dignity. There is a scene where a Pakistani General goes on to say that the Indian Army doesnt even know how to respect it's soldiers and dead!I am truly shocked at the anti India and pro Pakistani sentiment being sold here under the garb of a stupid love story that lacks any substance.

reviews.review_title: A HEART MELTING LOVE STORY INTERTWINED WITH INDIAN PATRIOTISM
reviews.content:
A masterpiece of a movie. Well filmed and edited. The story of a princess & an army soldier so professionally narrated. The audiences will be glued to their seats with so much suspense & thrill. Feel like as if it had really happened in front of my eyes. Kudos for the producer & director of the movie, Ms. Ashwini, Priyanka & Swapna Dutt's for their cinematography talent. We require more such talent in the Telugu industry. Bollywood Bye,
Bye. Tollywood welcome.Anybody who feel otherwise about this movie only goes to prove that they have not watched this movie or else have not understood it at all.

Sita Ramam is a love story in the backdrop of war lacks some depth. It follows the same predictable love story pattern with a set of cringe fest but the writing includes enough incidents to keep us engaged and draws a liking to the movie. Its again the usual role for dulquer but his charm was enough for this one and he was able to handle it well despite a shaky start and will be one of the memorable performances in his filmography. The best for me was mrunal thakur. She was able to fit into the role and there was easiness and great screen presence and however felt her character had less to do towards the later half eventhough its prsence is always there. Rashmika might had a better role compared to her previous ones but acting wise didn't see anything notable except stiffness. The bgm was the best thing for the movie followed by cinematography. The visuals were good and had everything enough for a love story but sometimes felt it was overshadowing the same. There were overdose of songs along with overdose of ram devotion and ram slogans used by Pakistan official which didn't seem cool. Kashmir and military were easily accessible, not sure if it's because of the timeline but looked silly. We could also see woman wearing sarees in snow and its irritating to see such scenes even now. Overacting by one of the central character and the artificial props and effects can also be added to the irritating list. Despite these shortcomings, the final output qualifies as an enjoyable cinema owing to the genuine effort of the team.

Wonderful romantic love story released recently. Story seems like the movies that we had seen in the previous years. But still this was a unique. The songs and bgm was extraordinary. Especially the interval bgm and the climax bgm was wonderful. We could even watch the movie only for hearing bgm. The pair of dq and mrunal was also mind-blowing. Special thanks to crew members. The artwork and location was a green energy to our mind. Hats off to the music director vishal Chandrasekhar making a magical songs in the movie. The climax scene made my eyes watery. Such a touching climax. The bgm is created based on classical raaga. Since the movie is based on backdrop of war, which adds intensity of the film. Songs in every language is superb, the words in each language suits with the background score thats the speciality. Love story like this has to be released more. I watched the movie in Malayalam but the dialogue written doesn't felt awkward for me, felt like seeing a normal Malayalam movie.

A massive work was done by the director, the second half of the movie was full of goosebumps with emotions , DQ & Mrunal was done an excellent performance , I'm sure about their acting carrier was going to reach next level on all over the world film industry.

reviews.review_title: One of the best lovestory movie
reviews.content: 'SITA RAMAM' casts Dulquer Salmaan as Lt. 'Ram' & Mrunal Thakur as 'Sita' .Among other actors, Rashmika Mandanna has done a great job as Afreen aka Waheeda. Jishu Sengupta as Akbar(Noorjahan's brother) has delivered an awesome performance.Dulquer Salmaan & Mrunal Thakur has done justice to their respective characters. Their pair looks just awesome. This pair is a joy to watch on- screen.The story telling is just effortless. The story carries you with its journey. You will enjoy the pair's journey very smoothly. This movie is full of good technical parts. The introduction scene of 'SITA' is just fantastic.Production design, set design is just awesome.This is a must watch film.

What a feel good movie it's really emotionally involved to audiance. It's a example most of Indian people humanity have very sensitive about caring life and values. The movie creater ultimately 100% he expose what he will thought. Sitha character 🙌 no one talk about the importance of character and performance amazing. Every supporting actress performance not like acting, it's really emotionally involved that characters this very very reality exposed of the film. Intervel is stunning to the audience and climax is unbelievable. This is the excellence of Indian cinema wow. This movie got deffenetly most precious awards taken no doubt, and movie capturing, locations, art's, music screen presens what not everything is good. Thank you for giving this movie thanks to entire Sitha Ramam movie team'

Light hearted romantic drama with comic relief in between.Lead actors have lived up to the characters and Mrunal Thakur looked beautiful.Songs and BGM are very rich.Many scenes were shot in Kashmir and cinematography is nice.The character of Rashmika Mandana goes through a transformation as the story progresses and the sceenplay keeps the viewers engaged.This is a love story worth watching for this generation as it shows the love of a soldier and an aristocratic girl in 1965.I came out of the theatre with satisfaction and it was a great Friday for me.It is a complete family film which can be enjoyed together.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful love story - New generation Veer Zara
reviews.content: Will make you believe in love. Will make you cry. You will fall in love with the characters. Music was too good, mesmerizing to the ears. Loved the Mrunal+Salman acting, it felt like natural. Best love story I watched recently after 96.Although the movie is not perfect, the characters + story made me to give 10 stars (+ music, even though I didn't understand Telugu songs, it felt too good to my ears). Loved the way, director built the characters in the movie. Too emotional at the end. I just wished they would have ended up being together like in Veer Zara.Really missed watching it in theatre, but watched same day it released on the Amazon Prime Video.

reviews.review_title: One of the best love story.
reviews.content:
I think it can be placed among One of the best love stories portrayed very well with fine acting by actors as well as wonderful work by the director, applause to the production team as well as to the art department for making everything look in the movie just as mid 19's, I seriously like the way they portrayed the palace scenes it's soo beautiful
exceptional work by the movie department there hard work can be seen.The story takes off slowly but keeps you engaged with the beautiful love story followed by a heartfelt ending
music was soo beautiful that every song was melodious.Just one word about the movie
" BEAUTIFUL"

This periodic love story is a visual treat with absolutely painting like scenes , storyline is a bit odd ,unpredictable but is very good , DQ and Mrunal are simply amazing , scenes between them are so good with pleasing visuals , dialogues and bgm . Songs are cherry on the cake to this masterpiece , all the cast did well throughout , interval and climax just wow , especially the climax is full of emotions , it is a must watch , the way director handled the topic of Kashmir is too good.

reviews.review_title: More than a love story it has great personification
reviews.content: Not just another kiddish love story, this movie has portrayed great personification of both the centric characters. We will start loving the DQ role from the first 5 mins of his appearance and even though I watched the dubbed tamil version the poetic lines were really impressive and the love story was better than any movies in the last one decade. So far should have the best of Dulquer Salman. Movie gives a positive feel of love for lives and souls not just love for opposite gender. Even though the climax is a tragic one the wait the way director personified DQ's character was heart touching :) just missed this in theatres.Definitely the best love story of this decade. Mrunal Thakur role was adorable.

reviews.review_title: The one where you fall in love with every Frame
reviews.content: The movie's plot is simple and predictable at the end but its the love story and effort by the cast which makes you wait on the seat till last and catches all your attention towards the screen.The love story portrayed here has never been showcases in any Indian movie so far with such beauty 😍😍😍Sita an anonymous girls who starts writing the letter's to Ram an solider who is serving in the mountains who later embarks on a journey to find Sita his wife as per the letters and eventually both really falls in love.The music of the movie takes you through the magical journey of the perfect love story.
Wonderfull movie,excellent chemistry,good narration,bgm, perfect cast,it treat to watch in theater.engaging movie with perfect twist.overall i enjoyed it.

This movie has brought tears in my eyes after a reallyyy reallyyy long time! The story is amazing and has been supported by great acting from the entire starcast - but special callout to Mrunal! 😍 She has pulled off the role of Sita like nobody ever could. This is a must watch movie for people of all ages! 🙌🏻The movie has a bit of everything- comedy, romance, thriller twists and above all grest cinematography. I watched it on Prime but this movie deserves a watch in theatres.I saw it in Telugu with subtitles but planning to eat h it AGAIN in Hindi in theatre tonight. Such movies deserve more love and appreciation than some of the trash content thas has been produced lately.

He didn't know that she was a princess. Although he was planning to treat her like a queen, obviously it's not going to be enough for an actual princess no matter how hard he tries.She wanted nothing from him. She just knew that he was alone, an orphan. She thought sending a letter to a lone soldier would comfort him. It was fun, it was poetic. She just didn't realize that this would bring weakness and disaster for both. She already had everything in her life and it doesn't matter if she loses some additional fun and poetic moment.But for him? He just got everything he wanted in his life and going to lose it.Just watch this movie if you can relate the words above...

I can only tell that the hatred this movie is getting is not by the ones who watched the movie but ones who didn't even watch it. They just comment on what ever they want to tell just because they hate DS or director or rashmika idk. But actually this movie is a masterpiece and deserves to be a masterpiece with lots and lots of positive talks. I'm kannadiga and this is my first non Kannada movie review. Since I loved this movie with my whole heart.

Indian cinemas has lost charm in making good romance movies. I almost lost hope that if our directors and writers could ever repeat 90s style of romantic movies. I am so happy that Sitaraman lights a new hope to the romance genre. It's a master piece of its time and total classic.SitaRaman sells heart breaking romance story so well that it pinches your little hearts with sadness and warmth. The movie plus point is its plot and music. Inthandam song is definitely one of the best parts of the movie. The song is different in each language yet sounds so wonderful. Cast of the movie is amazing, especially Mrunal Thakur, she stole audiences with her classy ness.We need more movies like this.

reviews.review_title: One of the greatest movie in Indian cinema
reviews.content: Clearly a masterpiece. Loved every bit of the film.Music, Direction, Screenplay, Cinematography, Art, Cast, Visuals...just everything was great.Dulquer and Mrunal as Ram and Sita are at their best forms. Will be remembered forever.Such a Beautiful Acting by both cool stars as an audience we could see their Love in Tears when an Emotion Scene and Love in their Smile when a Romantic Scene. Caring, Love, Dance, Emotion, Affection and more they are simply Superb..Over all Movie is awesome, fantastic and Excellent.. Everyone will Love the Movie definitely, bcz it is like that.. And Definitely this movie going to be # AWARD WINNING MOVIE #

reviews.review_title: Sita Raman Is A Beautiful Romantic Fairy Tale Love Story With Emotions And Heartouching Moments.
reviews.content:
Sita Raman Is One Of The best romantic Indian films ever made it is the best romantic film of this decade Just Like Veer Zaara A Fairy, Tale Of True Love Story Sita Raman Has A Heartouching Romantic Story, With Brilliant Visuals Especially The Songs. Story Is Beautiful And The Screenplay Is Good Perfomances Of The Cast Is The Highlight Especially Dulqaar Salman And Mrunal Thakur They Have Given A Brilliant Performance And Their Chemistry Is So Beautiful And Sweet. Rashmika Mandanna Also Does Good Job, Mrunal Thakur Looks Absolutely Gorgeous And Pretty. The supporting cast has also done good job.Positives
Performances
Brilliant Visuals
Chemistry Of The Cast
Beautiful Songs
Art Direction
Story
Direction
Screenplay.
What a feel good movie i am literally crying while watching this movie not only me entire theatre had crying, don't Miss In theatres you will definitely have great experience.
The best classic in recent times...must watch who genuinely loves movies because it's a "CINEMA" which is perfect that has all emotions..and the screenplay is worth mentioning.
Loved the movie especially DQ and mrunal. After so many days I watched a meaningful movie. Thank you vyjayanthi films. Do more great movies like this.

reviews.review_title: A heart touching epic love tale
reviews.content: You may have heard of Laila-majnu, Romeo-juliet. Watch this epic tale of love which starts on a high note and unfolds slowly.The fusion of suspense and jaw-dropping execution is something this film excels at.The production values are excellent with story set in 1960's time-line. Music and background score are excellent. Coming to performances everyone did justification to their roles.This story is about what happens to the relationship between ram and sita as story progresses and their whereabouts. The story is explored very well with good execution.Pre interval block and Climax twist are amazing.The story telling and screenplay are outstanding at its finest.

reviews.review_title: Great Movie with great Work from all angles 👍👌
reviews.content:
Very nicely described story line and character selection.A must must watch movie.Music is very soothing and relaxing.After a long time saw a movie with good base in all regards .This is one of the best stories I've watched in recent times... There are some movies which makes you feel wanting more of it... This is one such movie... Please do watch it if you are into love stories you'll never regret.. There are some people who are writing negative reviews... I think they didn't even watch this movie.. Please write review after watching..
Saw it 6 times already with family but still miss it .

Wondeful movie,the first half is a little lovey-dovey,but the emotions built up here works wonderfully in second half, culminating in a wonderful if devastating climax,the chemistry between DQ and Mrinal is too good.

reviews.review_title: Come fall in Love with Love
reviews.content: It makes you fall in love with love. The innocence and purity of love which is missing in now a days romance movies is brought back. You feel joyous, elated, sad and at times you are blushing as well while watching it. Imagine that pure and sweet feeling of love that makes you feel your heart is full to overflowing with the effervescent emotions it evokes. The movie is about that love. It also shows that when you have your heart and soul filled with that love and those memories, your life still goes on as that is what your love wants for you. How ever far they are, Raam and Seetha will always unite as only they can complete each other. Rather than becoming decrepit, she celebrates her love along with fulfilling her goals and duties.The theme involves POK, Kashmir, Ind Vs Pak hatred, Hindu-Muslim sentiments and all possible controversial things. But everyone will get the feel good factor only from all these controversial things.There is good amount of sentiment and romance throughout the movie. In fact my eyes got moist towards the end of the movie. I felt so tightened in my chest in this movie after "96".Special mention of the colour palette of the movie as well - from the outfits to the props around, everything matched perfectly with each and every surrounding and looked soo good!! A huge fan of the music as well. I just wish I would have been able to check this movie out in the theatres.

Very few movies gives soul satisfaction. This movie is one of them. It felt like real instead of movie as i don't know if it is real story. I have seen similar stories but the taking, screen play, actors acting are very good. I haven't seen this movie for so long after release thinking low of this film but after watching, i felt i missed it for this long. Recent movies are not interesting to me particularily after watching first 10 min. This film made me watch it even though i cannot find time to watch in full. I paused it after first 10 min so many times. Hero, heroine and director deserves appreciation. It felt like Gowtham Menon movie.

reviews.review_title: A one of a kind love story!
reviews.content: A bit of Roman Holiday, a bit of Veer Zara but still unique in its own way. Beautiful art direction and camera work. The story unfolds in different ways, giving it the much needed suspense that is usually absent in love stories. The protagonists did a great job, had a great screen chemistry and perfected every scene that the director wanted to create. The movie offers a freshness amidst all the turmoil the story involved. There was kindness, love, devotion, truthfulness and sacrifice portrayed in various ways throughout the movie. Some of the special effects and makeup work could have been better and realistic.

reviews.review_title: A Classy, Poignant and Timeless Love Story of All Time
reviews.content: For the first time in Cine Industry The True Meaning of Romantic Genre is very well defined by our brilliant director Hanup Garu. The film takes place in two circas which suits the film the best as it happens in both time lines. The story revolves around two major characters Ram (Dulquer Salman) And Sita Mahalakshmi (Mrunal Thakur). The letter Which Ram writes to Sita gets the story to move at the first place. Rashmika Mandanna as Afreen was the reason why the story starts as she takes the responsibility to deliver the letter. Both Dulquer and Mrunal delivered an unforgettable performance that their characters arc was framed well. Not only the main characters were given the entire focus but other characters were also equally concentrated according to their roles. What I personally felt and experienced is that After A Long Time I've Seen a Great Film that Truly defines the meaning of Love and the film also Depicts an Extraordinary Romance without intimacy being portrayed. Even though the film's story is so complex it avoids all the lags and gives the audience a wonderful time with beautiful and fascinating frames and segments by having the best direction. Last but not the least the music and background score by VC is the soul of the film and peaks our emotions in every scenes. SITA RAMAM isn't just a movie it is beyond that it's an exact Art depicted by the Artists.

reviews.review_title: Epic romantic tale of art, music & Poetry called SITA RAMAM
reviews.content:
First of all, I am not a movie buff & this is my first review on IMDb just because of the matter of false rating (abt 17%- 1-star rating) on IMDb raised by many fans on various social media platforms. I just want to tell you that those ratings by some people (haters) are just because of the massive success of Sita Ramam. Believe me, THIS IS JUST a PURE LOVE STORY of the current generation. Max I can compare is with the classic cult ROJA.The best part was I watched the Telugu version (with English subtitles) with very basic knowledge of the language but I realized that beautifully crafted movies neither have any language barrier!Coming to the performances, in Sita Ramam I could see only characters who are memorable for a lifetime! Whether it is an empathetic Ram (DQ), an elegant Sita (Mrunal) or a rebellious Afreen (Rashmika) they will just be loved as characters forever. Every character, big or small was so beautifully penned & executed and I was in awe of the fact.Apart from all the actors who have already proven in their careers, the surprise pack was Mrunal as "Sita Mahalakshmi" (pardon me DQ)!!! An epitome of beauty & career-best performance. What a dream debut she had! She is going to stay here in Tollywood for sure. Congrats...
Music by Vishal Chandrasekhar has been ruling the chart and connects with that era of 1960-1980. Cinematography by PS Vinod sir, Choreography by Brinda master, Costumes by Sheetal Sharma and what else everything was perfect.Coming to Mr Hanu Raghavapudi, we are indebted for gifting us the pure love saga of our lifetime... Even after 2 weeks since I watched it, every scene & the emotions are afresh in my mind! Also thank Vyjayanthi Movies & Swapna Cinemas for the production values which echoed their passion for cinema!Lots of love guys.... All the best for all future ventures...

reviews.review_title: Spectacular isn't the movies best quality
reviews.content: At 12.30 midnight, since I wasn't finding sleep I decided to try out this "Highly rated" movie which everybody is talking about for an hour and decide if I will finish it the next day or not. Well that was a mistake!Not only could I not help myself with the whole helping of the movie, it was so good that I had to make some popcorn in the middle of the damn night.The story is about love, hate and the miracle of life. I don't know why people don't think so, but I sincerely believe that Mrinal Thakur is amongst Bollywood's new generation's most reliable actress along with Alia Bhatt. She has done a great job throughout the movie.The cinematographic brilliance, the direction and the performances of the two female leads and the dialogues (Important to rate after Brahmastra) are enough to call it a good movie, but the script truly makes it great. The twists and turns in the dramatic love story of Ram and Sita are thrilling and quite surprising at atleast 2 places. The second twist just blew me away.Besides Mrunal Thakur, Rashmika Mandana also has a lasting impact (No surprises there right?). Its the male stars of the movie who have stolen the one star that would have made it an absolute perfection!

reviews.review_title: Come fall in love with Love💝
reviews.content: It makes you fall in love with love. The innocence and purity of love which is missing in now a days romance movies is brought back. You feel joyous, elated, sad and at times you are blushing as well while watching it. Imagine that pure and sweet feeling of love that makes you feel your heart is full to overflowing with the effervescent emotions it evokes. The movie is about that love. It also shows that when you have your heart and soul filled with that love and those memories, your life still goes on as that is what your love wants for you. How ever far they are, Raam and Seetha will always unite as only they can complete each other. Rather than becoming decrepit, she celebrates her love along with fulfilling her goals and duties.No love story is complete without soulful music and eternal lyrics which was abundantly present and such perfect rendition of the songs by the singers that all the songs are going to become melodies which has not happened for a telugu movie in a very long time.Overall it made my weekend one of the best on the recent weeks. Kudos to Dulquer Salmaan for showing why Raam will always be the ideal choice when choosing a husband. Mrunal is ok but Seetha still needed to be played with more conviction as Seetha is beauty with brains. Rashmika was a perfect brat.

I just finished watching this movie and guys i will tell you that this movie is piece of art!!The screenplay,the story writing, dialogues, song etc are all perfect! The story moves forward with twist and turns and never let your eyes move out of the screen. This movie presents a unique love story with smoothness and never make it look cringe and like cliche. If you guys are planning to witness this piece of art then it's a thumbs up from mine side, don't hesitate don't think much and watch it with your family and friends.I don't why few people give 1 star rating and try to manipulate the plot but guys stay away from all such reviews .

reviews.review_title: Wow, What a classic love story!
reviews.content: Words can't describe how beautiful and soul touching this movie is. Very engaging, emotional and romantic love story. Dulquer and Mrunal - hats off to you guys, can't take eyes off you both. All supporting cast did their part well too.Great storyline, screenplay, background score and songs. No unnecessary drama or action scenes. It is engaging till the last minute. Few moments will make your heart sunk and eyes wet.Still thinking about the movie, scenes and the dialogues. Nothing short of a modern masterpiece. Hanu Raghavapudi and team - well done and looking forward to more..Must watch guys!

It's been a long time since we witnessed such a pure love story on celluloid. Marvelous shots and such a good script, keeping us enthralled and glued till the movie ends. I have developed even more respect and admiration for Indian army after watching the movie. Kashmir scene shots and the vintage touch of the movie are another plus points.The movie makes us believe that true love succeeds against all odds and remains even after the person is no more in this world.All in all a blockbuster for the ages.

No unnecessary romance. Everything is pure and pious. In an era full of lust, please make yourself comfortable watching a true story of love.

Salute to the Sita Ramam director
And Love to DQ, Mrunal, Rashmika
Sita Ramam is a 2022 Indian Telugu-language period romance film written and directed by Hanu Raghavapudi. Produced by Vyjayanthi Movies and Swapna Cinema, the film stars Dulquer Salmaan and Mrunal Thakur (in her Telugu debut) as the titular leads with Rashmika Mandanna and Sumanth. Set in 1964, it follows Lieutenant Ram, an orphan Indian army officer serving at the Kashmir border, gets anonymous love letters from Sita Mahalakshmi. Ram is on a mission to find Sita and propose his love. What a emotional love story
Note: The South Indian Directors 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

Just watched in OTT in Telgu(with english subtitles), although I can understand hindi. Ha ha , really good stories do not need a language to define. Such a fine story. Pure love. But actor did not know till last that she is a princess..

reviews.review_title: Greatest love story of recent time.
reviews.content: Go watch it at any cost. Dulquer salmaan is the show stealer. Mrunal thakur also performed very well. And the other actors also made their duty very well. The direction is absolutely appreciatable, Hanu sir, love from malayalam for making our DQ.

reviews.review_title: Too many twists and turns, bit lengthy
reviews.content: I liked to movie but retrospectively thinking it felt bit lengthy and overstretched through the middle. The story was engaging though, 2nd half is much better and decently narrated however first half felt too much focussed on the love story (which could have been easily cut by 20-30 minutes).Waheeda's character is bit confusing, she randomly wears hijab so it was bit confusing to gauge her role (as a Pakistani), her role was perhaps complex so benefit of doubt for the director.Dilquer & Mrinal are refreshing to watch, they keep your attention and have good screen presence.Prakash Raj is like eye sore, his acting is repetitive and it looks like tou watch Prakash Raj instead of his character on screen .There are few amateur (and avoidable) dialogues like Pak Officer saying Jai Shri Ram and Indian officer reciprocating it with Khuda hafiz - Com'on!!

It's an okay okay movie. The army portions of the movie lacked basic research and felt like filler scenes. The love story was the main plot of the story which honestly feels rushed at times. A love story has to evoke emotions but this one fell short by a few notches. The chemistry between the couple was good and both Dulquer Salmaan and Mrunal Thakur played their parts convincingly. It was refreshing to see Rashmika playing a character that was relatable and had grit. One more fact I loved about this movie that heroines or female leads haven't been portrayed as plain blank stupid which is an issue with 99% Telugu movies. The female leads had a meatier part to play with a variety of shades. Sumanth also played his part well. It is a great one time watch. But not an exemplary and timeless romantic saga for hardcore romance lovers.

reviews.review_title: My first review on imdb to prevent you from wasting your time.
reviews.content: Lieutenant Ram, who is posted at LoC, receives hundreds of letters from strangers after a radio jockey, who interviews him team on their successful work, come to know that Ram has no family and asks people on radio to shower love and treat Ram like a family member.Among them is Sita, who treat him like her husband in her love letters. Ram keeps reading her letters and at last takes leave and goes to find her.A Lieutenant, posted at LoC, that too when there is tension in the region, doing what??If Indian army personnels would have time for all this, Kashmir would have been lost to Pak already.It's 2022 and public expect some logic in movies.

A mind blowing master piece that keeps you gripped to the screen until the end. The entire ensemble have done a phenomenal job. It really felt like watching an Indian fairy tale with so emotional outburst until the end.

reviews.review_title: One of the best romance movie
reviews.content: When in today's world romance movie simply means more and more sex or sexual activities. It is completely different and took your emotions to a next level. Also make you fall in love with it. Maybe it a love story but direction is good and make you in suspense. Every time you will try to predict something and have to pay attention towards details. Filmed in 65 and 85 them, it will take you to your old time. When you were in incocent and used to love is everything you should care for.Story is tight and a movie which you can watch with full family and surely everyone would enjoy it.Only last.

Being an army soldier, I can tell that I have worked on every detail in this movie. Like the Blue Ribbon on Ram's Left chest indicates High altitude posting.I have seen many times, Bollywood people are adept at distorting meanings but I have become a big fan of South Cinema.Being an army officer, I congratulate all of you team 1 billion times for showing the above excellent cinema.Heartfelt salute to the actor who played the role of Ram and thank you for being encouraged by this movie.Those Co-ordinate are very imp to us but Mejor Ram is Also very Imp not only Good qualified Soldier but also a Gentle personality.Thank you.

I don't know why people are giving it so less rating. I think they thought it will be a Rohit Shetty movie with lots of action.I loved the movie very much and am satisfied that my time was not at all wasted. People now a days are emotion-less and hence can't understand the emotion of the movie. This movie has everything in it, be it action , thrill, love etc. You are surely gonna cry while watching this. Don't let the reviews stop you from watching this. See for yourself and then judge it.DQ is a phenomenal actor and has delivered a nice performance and Mrunal also acted quite well in it.Enjoy.

reviews.review_title: Will be remembered as one of the best Romantic movies comes from South India!!
reviews.content:
I rarely write a review to any films. But this film is very special. Perfect blend of heartwarming and heartbreaking moments!!I will write pros and cons so you can decide whether to watch it or not.Pros:
1. Casting: Almost perfect cast.2. Lead pair: The chemistry between Mrunal and DQ is made in heaven.3. Music: For a romantic film to win the hearts of audiences it should have great music and this film delivers it perfectly.4. Acting: DQ as Lf. Ram and Mrunal as Sita lived their role.5. Climax: Beautiful climax with wonderful twists and turns.And last but not least emotional scenes were done brilliantly.Cons:
1. Few plot hole in the end which can be ignored.So in a way it's modern day Veer-Zaara. It could have been a great prequel if it was planned.So it's a must watch for cinema lovers. My rating is 8.5/10.

Seetha Ramam movie is the best drama movie ever and one of the best family movie, this film is less praised, it is a film made on full love without obscene glare, which can be seen with the whole family. Maybe, this is a lesson for those directors. That is that a good film can be made without any scenes, such a film is made once in centuries and that is Sita Ramam. Everyone's acting is very good, especially the hero and heroine. The way a soldier and his love story is depicted in this film is amazing and the twists of this love story make this film even better. The character of Sita and Ram cannot make a better film than this. To give a clue to the actor to be recognized by the heroine, Sita's Swayambar in Kurukshetra, these lines are the heart of this film.

❤❤❤First of all all my love goes to Mrunal Thakur for her elegant looks and performance throughout the movie. Watched the telugu version with subs. If you want to get the original beauty of a movie, watch it in it's original language. Language now isn't a barrier though when you have fabulous subs. The movie, it though felt a little bit inspired from Veer Zara, but having being said, it's got it's own storyline that impresses us throughout. Needless to say about Dilquer's acting potential and the other characters as well but I'am sure it's dear Mrunal who is surely going to be the buzz. Loved the movie. Climax was good. Don't Miss it. Watch It. #lovedsitaramam. What a MASTERPIECE. Muuahhh 😘😘😘

reviews.review_title: A cult classic of love stories that I have ever seen in movies till now
reviews.content: The two main lead characters, Ram and Sita, are designed in such a way that they will live in your heart for the rest of your life. With each scene, your admiration, love, and emotions for the characters grow stronger. Even the costumes, music, and screenplay complement these characters perfectly. Must watch for the love story lovers as we rarely get this kind of love story.

reviews.review_title: Best Review: Love story but not typical one
reviews.content: When we talk about typical bollywood love stories then a common frame comes into mind that1. Love at first sight.2. Boy stalk girl and try to impress her.3. Ignorance from girl.4. Boy saves either girl's life and then both fall in love.5. Parents resist their love.6. Then at last boy get the girl.Well this movie is almost same as said above but the events are in differnt order. I was amazed to see that changing the events can bring huge change in a love story.There is a treasure hunt element throughout the movie so it will keep you on the edge of seat.Basically A radical Pakistani girl who hate India has a job from his army man grandfather to deliver a letter from Ram to Sita. From there we get to know what is this story all about.This love stroy is so pure and amazing. You might need some tissues while watching. I recommend to watch this with your loved one.Thank you for reading.

All are fabulous....

Watch
It

Yes dont forget to support such kind of movie ...
Really thats called cinema ....

I was hearing about this movie for a long time from many movie reviewers in youtube. Today I finally decided to watch it. I must say, this is one of the best romantic film I have ever watched since the Tamil movie "96" which I had watched two years back. The concept of this movie by itself is absolutely brilliant, added to this is the skillful execution of the screenplay by the director. I must say that the movie is as balanced as it can be. You have got light hearted comedy moments as well as heavy emotional moments, all in perfect proportion, in a way that the core theme of the film is never lost. I must say that the emotional moments of the film had really made me cry, so this is not really a film for the faint-hearted. You have got some really outstanding playback songs in the film as well, which acts as the icing on the cake. Regarding the performances, well, what can I say much. I have actually no words for Dulquer Salmaan. The man is so freaking natural in front of the camera, it was a bliss to watch him act. And it would be wrong not to mention Mrunal Thakur. She was also equally charming and stole the moment in every frame she was in. This film is so wholesome and complete that I am regretting the decision of not watching it earlier in theatres. In short, this is a movie which I highly recommend not to miss at any cost.

reviews.review_title: Exactly how I wanted Radheshyam to be
reviews.content: Finally I was able to watch a movie which wasn't extraordinary but wanted to watch just a decent movie without much grandeur and action this movie ticks all boxes. This is not to be missed in the theatres.

reviews.review_title: Embrace love and fall in love.
reviews.content: You fall in love with love as a result. The purity and innocence of love, which are disappearing from modern romantic films, are restored. While watching it, you experience happiness, elation, sadness, and at times, flushing as well. Think about that pure, sweet love that makes your heart seem as though it is overflowing with the effervescent sensations it arouses. The love in the film is the subject. It also demonstrates that life continues even though your heart and soul are full with love and memories since that is what your partner wants for you. Raam and Seetha will always come together as only they can, no matter how far they are.Sita Ramam is a classic movie, easily one of the best in a couple of decades. Love, emotions, patriotism all breathe life into the film. Dulkar and Mrunal Thakur are outstanding with their life like performance, their chemistry and portrayal just brilliant. What a debut for Mrunal! Her expressive eyes are enough to convey the feelings of love, affection etc. Rashmika does a decent job and so are Suman as Bishnu Sharma, vennela Kishore and others were all used aptly. The narration is excellent starting from delivering a letter of 1965 twenty years later to Sita by Afreen till the climax as many twists and turns awaits us, leaving us with a heavy heart in the end. Photography is fantastic and music is soulful and melodious. A breath of fresh air in the world of mass masala films. Kudos to the director Hanu, photographer, music director, art director, maithri movie makers and all the artists for their fantastic efforts, not bothering about commercial interests. Go and watch the movie for the sheer class and masterly narration.

reviews.review_title: This my first movie review for any movie...and this movie compelled me to write a review here....
reviews.content: This is the best love story I have ever seen, I don't know I ever forget this story in my life. This movie tells us what's the true love and how we have it with ourself in a most precious way....... I think this is the greatest love story on a life of soldier after Veer Zara. I don't know how express my emotion after seeing this movie.... I don't know this message is going to the director of this movie or not but I want to say thank you so much for making this love story...and both mrunal and salmaan you make us cry ....a great performance which I have ever seen.. and after this movie mrunal becomes national crush of India.

What a movie they have made.. south indian movies are on rampage.. aise hi bollywood niche nai jaa rha hai. They font have such content.. such content is not being seen now a days in bollywood.. a super romantic movie and a movie of lifetime.

reviews.review_title: Very entertaining, strong acting performance and engaging script
reviews.content: Very rarely you see so many surprise elements in a movie. It is filled with strong acting performance by all the key characters. I have liked performance by Mrunal a lot. Her expressions are speechless in the movie. It feels genuine, honest and you feel all the emotions with the characters. Music has also been very soothing to the ears. Overall a very fine movie, which will leave you a fan of director raghavapudi, dulquer Salman and mrunal thakur. All the scenes are crafted very beautifully. The background, costume design are perfect to the occasion and enhancing the beauty of this movie. We need more scripts and direction like this. Rashmika's character lacks some spark but she has done justice to her role. Coming to script, it keeps taking twists every 10 minutes so you can't guess where the story is leading. You couldn't get bored watching this movie. I am not able to find any flaw in the movie so therefore giving it 10/10 stars.

If I was to sum up my lifetime of seen movies and rank one in top 5 ever, this movie would definitely be there.An extremely adequate blend of love, emotions, pain, sacrifice and every other element. The entire screenplay is apt and the casting is top notch. What is the ultimate winner is the story line. Dalquer, Mrunal, Rashmika.. all are absolutely wearing their characters to the best possible. The ending blew my mind away. The BGM is classy. Casting of Mrunal couldn't have anything be better.Just that the movie slows down in pieces (total maximum 10 mts) but no scene was actually unnecessary. Those who love virgin emotions, don't miss it.

reviews.review_title: Anti Muslims elements have handled better in the initial scenes
reviews.content: Apart from the starting 4/5 scenes where they handles anti Muslims/Pakistani elements, the film was fantastic. Emotions and the love sequences were worked quite well. Don't whether Rashmika is the perfect casting to do that Muslim girl role.(wasn't convincing in the beginning).I have seen this in many film where director damage one community entirely by portraying something and later on with a character or two they trying to show something good from that community and trying to compensate the damages earlier caused. This is bizarre way of film making. This should be changed.I have seen tons of Indian movies I am just curious that, whether the Pakistani film industry also portray the same way as how Indian film industry showing Pakistanis and their armies on Indian films.

reviews.review_title: Could have been a lot better
reviews.content: Two starts for the fact that this movie actually tried to bring two communities closer. Other than that the dialogues were too cringey and screenplay was bad. Actors tried to keep the story in line but no luck. Too many mistakes were seen in most of the scenes. I have seen this movie in Hindi (dubbed) which makes it more embarrassing as the translation of otions have completely failed at this. The second half of the movie is a bit better than first half because the first half has too many distractions for the story itself, while sevond half has few surprises and supenses revealed. Overall the movie could have been much better if were more focused on sreenplay.

reviews.review_title: A Beautiful love Story I ever seen...💗💗💗💗

But the last scene made me feel sad.When the movie end we feel Sita and Ram both are among us and we think it will be good if Ram is alive.Songs and bgms in this movie are beautiful and the bgms are very apt for the these. Intervel scene is very beautiful and bgm for that scene awesome.Overall the movie is mind blowing, Beautiful I don't have word to express my feeling.Whenever I saw the movie my eyes will be in tears.
Its been a while for movies in 2022 being interesting, but sita ramam stands out delivering a interesting concept in the best way , the acting was also good with the music in the movie.

reviews.review_title: A poignant story of love in times of war.
reviews.content: Set in the context of Pakistani state sponsored terrorist campaign into Kashmir (Operation Gibraltar), the story introduces us to how commoners and elite rallied behind the Indian troops, particular an orphan, Major Ram. Among many letters to Major Ram, one letter stands out. Letter from Sita Maha Lakhsmi, a mysterious writer with a mischievous streak. Rest is an endearing love story that reveals itself in slow but gripping ways, driven by a purposeful screenplay. Its 9/10 and not 10/10 because of the soundtrack. Soundtrack is absurdly out of place in many parts of the movie to that point that it jolts the viewer out of the story.

reviews.review_title: True Feel of Love and a Classy Beautiful Love Story Of All Time
reviews.content: For the first time in the history of Cine Industry The True Meaning of Romantic Genre is very well defined by our brilliant director Hanup Garu. This film is Beautiful and also poignant at the same time. The film takes place in two circas which suits the film the best as it happens in both time lines. The story revolves around two major characters Ram (Dulquer Salman) And Sita Mahalakshmi (Mrunal Thakur). The letter Which Ram writes to Sita gets the story to move at the first place. Rashmika Mandanna as Afreen was the reason why the story starts as she takes the responsibility to deliver the letter. Both Dulquer and Mrunal delivered an unforgettable performance by living exactly as the characters of Ram And Sita that their characters arc was well framed. What I personally felt after watching the film is After A Long Time I've Seen a great Film that truly defines the meaning of Love. Even though the film's story is so complex it tends to avoid all the lags and gives the audience a wonderful time by having an amazing direction. Last but not the least The Music was the soul of the film as the score peaks according to the scenes. A Timeless Love Story Of All Time.

We don't treat other soldiers like hell. And I feel proud to be an Indian. The story is too good that everyone wants this to be happening in their life. Finding the love of your life can be the biggest achievement of this human birth.
