Awesome movie it is the best lovestory I have ever seen it was an emotional rollercoaster the music was so good and the acting of dulqar salman and Mrunal thakur was fantastic.

reviews.review_title: Great movie with a pure love story
reviews.content: After watching this movie, I can't believe that this kind of movie is still making by the directors. Hats off to the South Indian directors who are thinking way beyond the clouds. The best part of this movie is the pure love shown by the makers.The character of Ram and Sita is well described the makers. Nothing will be more pure than the love story of Ram and Sita.This is spiritually connected with the Lord Ram and Goddess Sita. Requesting to the Bollywood makers to please teach some lessons from the makers of this movie and please direct movies with a pure love stories. Still pure love exists in this world. Thanks a lot again.
Really an awesome love story movie. Watched such kind of a movie after long time. Climax was really heart touching didn't expected that the climax would be like this.

reviews.review_title: Honest film-making wins always and everytime!
reviews.content: When Sita Ramam was announced no one could have predicted this success since there weren't many clues to do so. The actors, director, music etc did not have stronghold on filmgoers opinion at that time. But this film proved that Honest Film-making is the key. Just pure craft. The locations, the dialogue, the acting, the music, the costume design, set design, cinematography, screenplay, direction and what not! There is 100% honesty and commitment in this endeavour. Biggest plus here is the filmmakers have not taken audience for granted and have diligently delivered their best product. These are good signs for Indian movies and a breath of fresh air for audience as well. This film has broken all barriers that ever existed. It has shown Dulquer's acting range and Mrunal's magnetic charm. Must watch. This one is here to stay.

reviews.review_title: Perfect movie to feel the joy of love
reviews.content: Movie has complete essence. Vijayanthi movies are have done great movies in the past and now their daughters and Nagi are doing a great job in carrying it for future. We are lucky to have banners like you to make best telugu movies.And Hanu garu proved his style of telling love stories in a special way. Great cast. In this genre this will be a one of remarkable movie. Hare krishna hare ram. Good luck haters with fake rating.

reviews.review_title: I will give 10/10 rating based on story.
reviews.content: In one word "A poignant love story" .Not everything about Sita Ramam works to the. Extent of making it a classic live story the make wanted it to be.Yet, The earnestness with which they attempt to narrate a movie story of romance hold it all together. One this here we are as modern age no vulgarities, no abuse , awesome love story movies. It made me pain cry literally.It is a love story lived and doomed .The storytelling make it poetic and the actors add them charm.The beauty is all around. A fairy-Tale love saga with a Burning Heart Laced By brilliant background score.This called pure and true love story.

First of all this movie become so phenomenon due to its content given by writter director and actor/actress , the acting is also phenomenon ,climax part was superb which was full full of tears and emotions.Every sec of movie introduce a different kind of feeling ,which relate to real story while being a reel story. This kind of love story is seen in a decades. Hope the #CINEMA will change there mindset that a better film will comes from story not from investing lots of money . Hatesoff to all critic , Crue members to given there best short over the movie.SITA RAMAM is not a movie it's a emotion.

Just finished watching the film and cant stop praising about it. Haven't watch such movies in a long time. The cast, the story it hits you. It is very relatable, loved the film. Thanks to the film makers and actors for giving us such a
treat . The storyline is captivating. All the actors have done a superb job. Even though the movie is dubbed, still even for a second we dint feel any gap in understanding the intent of every scene. And obviously the relation to our culture and history is a treat to watch. 👌👌👏👏👏🙏 A love story like no other. Aside from the love story, the background story is also great.

reviews.review_title: The best Love story movie of this decade ✨
reviews.content: You can't expect a better love story than this in this decade.He (Dulquer Salmaan) OMG every time he's coming up with a strong presence to the cine industry with his power packed performance and with his story selection as well, you're a gift to this entire Indian Film Industry.Mrunal Thakur wow wow wow what an impact you've created in the very first film itself in South India. I've seen her Hindi films as well of her , she's an incredibly talented; what an screen presence, phenomenal expression timing and she's should do more Tamil film's.This is an Excellent Movie which makes some people to shed some tears aswell if I'm not wrong. My only concern is songs could have been lil more better. But BGM is very pleasant and pleasing.P. I cried at the end of the movie, The love story which touches and breaks our Heart simultaneously. You won't leave this movie when start watching. The Characters Sita Mahalaxmi and Lt. Ram, I will never forget them. Amazing movie, with some beautiful songs, stunning locations and genius direction. Making a movie Masterpiece, After a long time I have seen such a beautiful love story. Not only a love story, You won't get what will happen next, So, many twists in this love story which isn't copied from anywhere. The twist like when Ram meets Sita first time, so many twists. And the climax is awesome when the letter reached its destination, Every true lover will cry on that part.

From the start to the end it remain in the same tune
The love between Ram & Sita was surreal
Whole credit goes to the cast and also director
Music, Screenplay, Scene was perfect for the movie
In the middle it's lit bit slow but managed by somehow.overall i love the concept and this should watchable for me several times sure.Dalquer there's no doubt that he is amazing actor & he kept us through the whole movie time.rashmika was good but mrunal thakur i love her acting and my initial thoughts is this is BEAUTIFULRecommended to those ppl who loves to watch such a love story and I'm sure everyone will be enjoyed it.

reviews.review_title: Superb, wants more movie like this
reviews.content: I didn't like ending but it's based on true story that's it's hurtful at the end. I fall in love with mrunal, it's amazing. Story begins with Afreen 'a Pakistani girl' in London. Unfortunately she made a mistake by burning the car of Principal, later she needs money to pay, visited to home , his lawyer handed a letter to send SITA, in exchange of posting a letter to an unknown person, she will get all the money left by his grandfather, she landed in India in search of SITA, there in Hyderabad, she met with Balaji (her senior), asked for help to find the SITA, they searched her through every possible sources. And at the end she got to know the truth. This is my first review of any movie.

While watching this movie Tears came from my eyes.One the finest love storyStarting se lekar end tak jab aap is movie ko dekhenge to Aesa lagega ki koi aapki prem kahani film ke parde par bata raha. Kya gajab ki story likhi hain.Ek bar dekhna shuru kiya to fir pura khatm hi kar ke maneClearly a masterpiece. Loved every bit of the film.Music, Direction, Screenplay, Cinematography, Art, Cast, Visuals...just everything was great.Dulquer and Mrunal as Ram and Sita are at their best forms. Will be remembered forever.Dont miss it on theatres. Its a family must watch. A clean and poetic romantic drama. Just go for it!

The sacrifices that Sita (Noor Johan) made for her love and leaving everything behind despite been wealthy and influential princess, just to marry Ram and lives the life of a commoner.
It was magical 2 hr 43 minutes of my lyf love this no words the screen just talks every moment it's so outstanding screenplay direction everything main characters are outstanding.

reviews.review_title: One of the Marvel's of India
reviews.content:
This is one of those films which will make tears come out.1. This shows the true strength of love
2. This shows reality of kindness
3. This shows the sacrifice that our Indian soldiers doWith regard to the story- Not sure how some one could think like this... The entire movie is like a puzzle and finally when it's solved it's a disappointment to the audiance and shows the true path of life.Like every thief leaves a trace of himslef. The director made a mistake with character Vishnu.Director wanted Vishnu to get caught, but his character was never of that kind basis the establishment he has done about this characterThis is one of those must watch films.

Fantastic storyline, most realistic acting by Mrunal and Salman and all other characters. Epic romance and suspense, cleverly designed scenes. A new and absolute definition of Romance and Love has been set by this movie. Overall the best movie that I have watched in past few years. Classical masterpiece!The way Salman and Mrunal have portrayed their roles is truly awesome. The movie gives feel of the contemporary time. Such a awesome lovestory that everyone will fall into love with. A heart touching story that will surely make you cry. The story that carries you along it till the end of the movie. Certainly, Can't get rid of its song, such a fantastic music and lyrics.Must watch for everyone!!!

DQ as Lt. Ram played so effortlessly with his boyish charm, blushing face in love scenes & most importantly dubbed in his own voice! Mrunal Thakur as SitaMahalakshmi urf Noorjahan just lit the screen every time they appeared together! Dream debut of Mrunal down south & must say that YOU HAVE ARRIVED! You are going to stay here for long. What a chemistry between Ram & Sita and I was just sucked into the world of Ram garu & Sita garu and the journey further was nothing short of a spectacleLots of detailing from the Sarees to Dulquer outfits to Number Plates on the Cars to interiors of the Train to look and feel of an auditorium in 1960s etc.

reviews.review_title: Epic Love story, better than b-town masala movies
reviews.content:
Yesterday, watched this movie in Hindi version. Story was so well writtern and its beautiful execution made this movie superhit. No vulgur scenes, no itom songs; just classic love story.Here I'll emphasize more on word story cause the way it's executed, you'll not get detached from it even for 1 sec.Songs by vishal chandrashekhar bring more essence to this epic Love story. Also chorus sung by childrens was just <3
This movie will make you laugh, will make you cry and will take you to the universe of lieutenant Ram and Sita mahalaxmi.The way Mrunal potreyed Sita Mahalaxmi, i think no one will do justice to it, if in case in future someone make remake of it.One of the best love story watched till date <3.

Hold your patience for first 20 minutes and there you are, watching a theatrical masterpiece!A story weaved with threads of pure, clean and soul nourishing love, it has beads of pride for one's own nation. You would cry for both, patriotism and the love they share as you travel the journey of love and loss with Sita and Ram. Mrunal and DS were paired as heavenly and were a treat to eyes.The story travels through the brooks of kashmir to enchanting gullies of hyderabad. A visual, soul and heart treat, it is praiseworthy for every move, twist and the ultimate end.Sita ramam reminds us how a love story needs not be completed in order to inspire, and make people desire, for true love.

reviews.review_title: I think you must watch it
reviews.content: Actually I am anime lover specifically thriller suspense and love story. I really liked it. I actually surprised many times even I predicted things but the way Actor worked is marvelous I really enjoyed, last suspense of Rashmika made me cry. Mrunal thankur acted very well, she is looking so gorgeous and in traditional get up it's mind blowing.Even if someone claim that story is copied or other very level of Acting was God level. So even you know story just watch it, I gurantee you like the way of acting. I am sure you will cry too. So according to me ,very nice movie, fully appreciated.Even it just a story or fake, but indian soldiers are martyr (saheed) really.so even this story is not true but feeling of lost soldiers family is true it's just a mirror of emotions how they feel when their loving one die for nation.I really appreciate it.

reviews.review_title: It's a Master piece and above KGF and RRR
reviews.content: It's a Master piece and above KGF and RRR What a film.. This is my first review on IMDB and after watching this film I couldn't resist my self to not write what I feel now.. you will taste the real feel of love after watching this film. What a performance from Dulquer and Mirunal. It's not an easy task to write a love story but believe that the script was again and again modified until it become a great one.. Also the twists are all acceptable and no where we feel this is something that never happen.. The second half was brilliant. Must mention that the Music and cinematography are also good. It's a must watch film and really worth it. Please do watch it..

That was a fantastic masterpiece lovestory i have watched recently, i dont know how to express how much i loved this movie, when i completed watching the movie i kind of felt an emptiness of sorrow but also felt the trance of feel-good ness and romance of sitalakshmi and ram ❤❤, the screen presence of every cast especially the charm of character sitalakshmi, those wonderful frames will happen only once in a while, i definitely recommend every movie lovers to watch this masterpiece, i kind of regret not able to watch this in theatres 😌👌🏼. Along with romance you will feel the essence of patriotism and harmony of religions, what movie 👌🏼❤

reviews.review_title: Solid mixture of Romance, Patriotism and Emotion
reviews.content: Sitaramam succeeded in making the audience relate to story. Dalqeer's fabulous acting as a soldier and a lover will touch every female's heart. High accolades to Mrunal Thakur for her superb acting as Sita. The biggest credit goes to director for making sequence of events in such a mesmerizing manner that audiences will not leave the sit till film is over. The scenes were shot so beautifully that audience would love to watch the movie again & again. Lastly they showed religious conflict and war between two countries without hurting any sentiments. That's how a movie is made and a story is told.

A heart-touching movie. It also defines true love and the sacrifices made in a relationship.Even, the story, music and songs make this movie very special. On top of that, the performance of the lead actor and actress is exceptional. The story is beautiful and its never got bored. However, the ending was quite sad and its not a usual happy ending one, yet it was a great movie.It is very rare we get such beautiful films. Kudos to all the team for making such a wonderful movie. Undoubtedly, a masterpiece.Thanks to all the team for making such a wonderful movie. Definitely, a movie to watch.

One of the best in Indian cinema - cast, music, direction, cinematography & screenplay, just wow. Hanu Raghavapudi did a wonder, no one expected this movie at all. Director needs to have a lot of courage to select this sort of story.Dulqeer and Mrunal will be Ram & Sitamahalakshmi for a very long time in perspective of audience, they nailed every bit of their roles.Vyjayanthi Movies, perfect comeback with back-to-back blockbusters.Vishal Chandrasekhar, man your music was so smoothing, BGM was never before, literally nailed every part of the movie, one of the biggest elements of the movie.Glad this is my first movie together with my wife :)Wish you all the best team.

Another amazing movie by brother DK after Mahanati. I felt like real life incident is happening in front of our eyes. I don't think we can imagine others in Sitamalakshmi role other than Mrunal. Movie gives us many turns and surprises while playing the story smoothly throughout. Hatsoff to Direct Hanu Raghavapudi for fantastic package for whole family to watch.With due respect to Indian Army, only part that director Hanu Raghav should have done it differently is Brigadier Vishnu's (Sumanth) exchange arrangements with Pak. We all would have died and Pak would have occupied India by now if our brigadiers do such unethical things. Director should apologize to IA for this part.Giving.2 star less because of my second paragraph above.

Sita Ramam is easily the best movie for the week and also one of the best movies of the year.The story and the screenplay are the backbone of the film. Also, the main characters have done an exceptional job. But since they have already established their prowess it comes naturally to them, especially Dulquar Salman. Mrunal Thakur has a great screen presence and this is going to be her benchmark.

This is my second review for any movie, I could not stop myself from writing this review as this is one of the best story and script I have seen in past few years, I could not find any loose ends in it, casting is perfect and their performance was awesome.The story builds slowly and towards the end one gets to connect all dots, it's a lovely story line and love story of Ram and Sita aka Noor Jahan.. We get to know why every main character is there in every movie..Looking forward to see some more movies with dubbing in Hindi from Hanu Raghavapudi as really loved the way he directed this movie, hats off to director and entire cast..

An emotional lovestory with enough twists and a good message Director handled the India Pakistan fight along with a love story very well worth watching. The cinematography is astonishing, songs are great. Mrunal Thakur looks stunning in saari and the cinematography enhances it pretty well. Feels like watching a classic old movie with a charm of new actors and cinematography.This movie starts like a usual love story but the last 45 minutes are very emotional.Well done team.

Such a great movie it's not a waste of time everyone should watch it atleast once.

Went to watch this movie on a random plan, without listening any public publicity on this movie & just for my belief on Dalqeer Salman's talent....... But Mrunal came out to be the Showstopper.. reviews.review_title: An ode to unblemished love and unspoken heroes.
reviews.content: This is going to be long and I have not revealed any spoilers to the best of my ability.I am not the one to write reviews but this movie has started haunting me to write one especially Mrinal's eyes.As they say "love begets love" and a pure and all knowing love can transcend anything.Mrinal(Sita) truly imbibes an aspect of the Sith'e tatva that no-one has captured so far. Mrinal as her name suggests is a lotus stalk and her namesakes in the movie have been aptly named. She is a bewitching beauty in the lines of Aditi Rao Hydari and Diya Mirza. Her potrayal is true to her natural self and majestic in every way. She comes out so much that it pains me to see Sita's yearning. Her eyes are bewitching and her performance is majestic. Mrinal is going to be winning hearts and I am quite sure that she is not going to get a taller role than this in her blossoming career.Dulquer(Ram) is an accomplished actor and I am not going to comment much. He has delivered the emotions and pain of his situation and the turmoil that he has to endure due to the circumstances that are thrown at him. Ram's character is bound to his kartavya as well as well as his longing to have a family of his own. He cannot deny his nature nor letgo of his longing.Sumanth(Brigadier Vishnu Sharma) has delivered the tryst associated in the most convincing way ever. He is an uptight character who is caught between having to go through various complex motions and make the tough calls that are needed to survive. Vishnu as the mythology suggests is one of the supreme trinity. His role to preserve the balance in this case his own calls for acts that are only justified for a god. A complex character that has been played flawlessly.Tharun Bhascker is refreshing and looks fresh. A special mention goes to the costume design team, the sarees reminded me of my mom's "Garden Varelis" from back in the day. Visually the movie has been aesthetically pleasing to watch.For the west this is going to be another "Notebook". For the south of India this follows the "Mahanati" template and is a "slow-burn-love-reveal".I would definitely look forward to the directors full extended cut if it ever comes out. For most this might be a long movie but this will be a killer watch on OTT. I would watch this all day long and get lost in Mrinals "doe" eyes.A must watch for romantics!Not sure why this hasn't been release in Hindi!

Very good film to watch, loved it's direction and happy to see this kind of story in this so called modern time. Sita Ramam is a 2022 Indian Telugu-language period romantic drama film written and directed by Hanu Raghavapudi and produced by Vyjayanthi Movies and Swapna Cinema. The film stars Dulquer Salmaan, Mrunal Thakur (in her Telugu debut), Rashmika Mandanna and Sumanth. Set in 1964, Lieutenant Ram, an orphan army officer serving at the Kashmir border, gets anonymous love letters from Sita Mahalakshmi. Ram is on a mission to find Sita and propose his love. In 1964, Ansari, a Pakistani extremist, does not approve of the brotherly relationship between Kashmiri Muslims and Hindus. He plans on severing the bond and separating them. He strongly believes that the Indian Army is the reason for the unity. He resorts to brainwashing teenagers in Pakistan and sends them to Kashmir. He advises them to live in disguise to make his plans work.In 1985, Afreen is a fierce Pakistani-based rabble-rouser in London, who dislikes anything about India. She sets fire to the car of an Indian philanthropist, Anand Mehta, in retaliation for burning Pakistan's flag. The management board of her university asks her to apologize to him. As Afreen doesn't like to say sorry to Indians, the philanthropist gives her two choices: either to give him 1 million (10 lakhs INR) as compensation or go to prison. Being a stubborn and unapologetic patriot, she decides to compensate him and goes back to Pakistan to meet her grandfather, Pakistan Army Brigadier Tariq, for giving her the money to compensate him. However, upon her arrival in Pakistan, she finds out that her grandfather passed away. In his will, he asks her to deliver a letter, which he could not, written in 1965, by Indian Army Lieutenant Ram to his lover, Sita Mahalakshmi of India. Upon successfully doing so, she will inherit his wealth. Though relucant at first, Afreen agrees to deliver the letter to her, so that she can inherit Tariq's wealth.

Sitaramam - A great love story.Why did exile alone come only to Sita?I don't write movie reviews. And if the film is Sitaramam, I don't think anyone can write anything. Mrinal's birth seems to have been successful because of this role. I don't think anyone other than Mrinal could have thought of this role to this extent. Mrunal looks very beautiful in Indian wear. By the end of the film, Ram and Sita settle in their hearts.The film surprises at every turn. Refreshes at every turn and fuels our curiosity. The direction is of high quality. The actors have been successful in giving their best. There are many such scenes which I feel like watching again and again.Rashmika makes a grand entry in the film. Rashmika dominates the film but only until Mrinal enters the film. By the end, only Mrinal remains in the film. I will just write about Ram - Amazing.Thank you that it was also made available in Hindi. Otherwise, the Hindi audience would have been deprived of a great story.According to me this is a better love story than '96'.Must see.

Such a great performance by both of them.Mrunal Thakur has acted so well, she is a piece of art in this movie which Dulquer Salmaan's character reads through.Period movie with the feels of early 90s and the set and background are also well fitting to the early 1960s and 70s, that it feels really a treat to watch this.Direction, script, screenplay, songs, performances everything is very well done and the last 40 minutes of this movie makes you feel so anxious man, I just love this.Will recommend everyone to watch this movie.

All actress acting was Watched the Telugu version that too without much knowledge of the language as neither Malayalam nor Tamil version were available at Surat, Gujarat. As they say music has no language; I will add "beautifully crafted romantic cinema" neither has any language!After ages, I have witnessed a movie that may be compared to cult classics like Roja. Director Hanu Raghavapudi has put a stupendous effort into making this poetic romantic tale with breathtaking visuals captured by cinematographer PS Vinod sir. Every scene was nothing short of a painting with such aesthetic the production house Vyjayanthi movies did & hats off to you guys! Another important aspect has been the music & BGM by Vishal Chandrasekhar, what a classic feel from the bygone era! As came to know from his video, all the traditional instruments only were used for composing the songs and it was creating such n impact suiting to the 1960-1980 kind of feel. Choreography by Brinda master was superb.Coming to characters, DQ as Lt. Ram played so effortlessly with his boyish charm, blushing face in love scenes & most importantly dubbed in his own voice! Mrunal Thakur as SitaMahalakshmi urf Noorjahan just lit the screen every time they appeared together! Dream debut of Mrunal down south & must say that YOU HAVE ARRIVED! You are going to stay here for long. What a chemistry between Ram & Sita and I was just sucked into the world of Ram garu & Sita garu and the journey further was nothing short of a spectacle!

So, without any hesitation you can watch it with your family.

reviews.content:
Oh bhai sahab😱😱
I can't say how amazing masterpiece movie was *SITARAMAN*" mtlb aanshu na beh jaaye to keh dena"
This is one of the movie jiske saamne 96 jaisi masterpiece bhi phikki par jaayegi.full of emotions.It is a very beautiful love story
showed in a very simple way. This is the perfect example of how a simple love story can be portraits beautifully without showing nudity, vulgarity and adult scenes.I can't explain how beautiful the movie is .i nearly cried during this movie.Iss tarha ki movie saalon baad aati hai who literally touches the heart of audience
I am speechless.If i would be an oscar giver to sach me iss movie ko hi de deta.Don't miss this movie in theatre.., ----
Everyone please watch thisBest hindi dubbing.Such a wonderful lovestory.Hatts off to the acting of dulquer salmaan,mrunal thakur,rashmika mandala and all the team of SITA RAMAN.In this movie i liked the most which is that awesome classical scene of background which reminds you 90s and that dressing sense u will get to see some Indian culture and traditions too.Shershaah(action and love story)+satelite shankar(that sweet hearted hero)+kashmir file(hindu muslim riots)+1971(prisoner in Pakistan)+Notebook=*SITA RAMAN*
In most of the cases if you mix up many movies then u will get "khichdi"
But director ne aisa na ho iss baat ka pura dhyan rakha hai.and this happens in very rare cases.

This is my 1st review about a movie... This movie is classical masterpiece.. Just WOW 😍 The story, the BGM, the next level presence of DQ and Mrunal, their chemistry, the way mrunal is shown in this movie, Man they just lived the characters...
I really don't know how it feels the Eternal love of Ma seeta and Lord Rama... But this #sitaram have made me to feel the Eternal love, the pure love ❤
Also it contains patriotic and communal harmony content which is well written and executed....
Its a classical emotional patriotic masterpiece....a movie which no one should miss...
#SITARAMAM will remain forever in my ❤

A must watch Movie. If you have a soft heart and if you can feel the feelings than it is for you. Although I am not a big fan of both the actors but in movie they nailed it.There eyes and there expressions are mind blowing.All in all it is a Masterpiece.

If you want to test the feeling of love towards the person inside you, then definitely watch this movie once, if even a single tear is visible in your eyes, then understand that you are still alive.And yes, if you remember whom while watching this movie, then understand that you are in love with that person. If such movies continue to be made in the movie world, then I don't think that every person will be able to stop himself from going to the movie theatre, this movie fully lives up to its expectation and this type of movie is liked by all of us including the family And we liked this movie very much.

Every thing was perfect with the love story. I really like the part that how beautifully they shows love between a hindu man and a muslim princess still we never thinks about it in whole movie but i don't like two scenes of the movie
1. Scene where indian embassy person says inshallah and pakistani brigadier says jai shree ram that's unimaginable.2. When an Indian Army soldier gave 12 coordinates of Indian Army bases which is somehow impossible. This defamed the image of indian army. Our soldiers will never betray their mother.But i also like that films shows connection between terrorist and Pakistan Army.

I was in tears at the end of this film, in love with it

Portrayed love story in such a beautiful wayy
Only emotions, no unwanted touches, no vulgarity
An example to be followed by filmmakers of todayDulquer & Mrunal have exemplary performed
Dulquer's innocence and Mrunal's beauty have added to the grace of this film
The scenes and the songs, no comments

This story will inspire the youth of today to have one true love
This is the first film that I have reviewed here
This film made me do so
Thank you for this epic story.

reviews.review_title: Excellent is less of a word to describe this movie
reviews.content: I was not expecting such a quality work. It's one of the best love story movies made in decade. I liked every cast. Ram and Sita justify their character. If someone has to see some quality Indian movies, this should be one in list. I am also surprised by the quality work of South Cinema. I would definitely recommend everyone to watch this movie. Music of this movie is pleasure to listen. Use of Indian classical music is to its best. Overall this movie is epic and one should not just go by random reviews but watch this movie. It deserves all the appraisals and accolades. Well done Murnal Thakkur. You are stunning actress.

After a long time, such type of superb movie I Watched. Perfect classic with great storyline, a brilliantly written love story. The actors lived their roles, every character has their own mark in the story. The romance between lead pairs was written perfectly. The love story and the movie will clinch your heart. It's a must watch movie.After a long time, such type of superb movie I Watched. Perfect classic with great storyline, a brilliantly written love story. The actors lived their roles, every character has their own mark in the story. The romance between lead pairs was written perfectly. The love story and the movie will clinch your heart. It's a must watch movie.

Thank you very much for such a great work for whole team.Some people relating this movie with veer zaara ,but i am sure this is totally out of it,much better than that.

Proud of this piece of art and Indian cinema, so much in it for other film makers to learn. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_title: One of the best Love story I've come across
reviews.content: I never wrote review before for any movie. But Sita Raman deserve it.Action, Romance,Love,Unity, a lot to experience in 1:40hrsKudos to the makers for highlighting such true story to the world.Salman and Mrunal nailed it at the same time Rashmika did well for fulfilling the need of the story.Been watched many Serving in Indian army serieses and Movies but this touched my heart the way their love story started. It's just beyond words.Highly recommended to know the true meaning of love and sacrifice.It gives an immense message about what Indian soldiers are and what they do for their country.A True Hero and a Lover.

A beautiful love story with heartful songs
A must watch movie for all.'Sita Ramam' is a well-made film with poetic visuals, songs, background score and mainly with a good story. Heroine Mrunal is beautiful, her chemistry with Dulquer works bigtime. First half an hour of the film is mediocre; the graph goes north as it progresses. Vyjayanti Movies and Swapna cinemas must be appreciated for making this film on large scale. Director Hanu finally delivers a success. In Second half emotions work well especially pre climax and climax scenes are well written. The scene right before Ram leaves to Pakistan assignment is well conceived by the director. Casting is a big plus in ' Sita Ramam '. Even a single scene character is played by a prominent actor. Vyjayanti Movies and Swapna Cinemas who produced national award winning classic ' Mahanati ' , spent lavishly on 'Sita Ramam'. The sets are lavish, the locations are authentic and production design is overall lavish.

One of the qualities of great writing is the we remember the character of the films rather than actor himself. For Ex : When we think about Sholay first thing that comes to mind is Jai, Veeru, Gabbar , Thakur & Basnati and then whoplayed those character. Without proper writing (story, screen play and character) it wasnt possible. Sita-Ramam also has some great story, screen play and camera work. Not only Sita - Ram we also remember Afreen, Waheeda, Balaji, Vishnu and Abu Tarique and that's I feel power of good writing. Excellent Camera work. I remeber one shot where Ram expalining his love and said I used to roam around India in vacation but now I want to settle with with you. The camera move along with Ram and when he say settle teh camera slows down and becom still any maore such small detail with camera.

reviews.review_title: Sometimes I Wonder I shouldn't have watched this so I could watch it again
reviews.content: Many stories are Fun to watch But only couple of stories create an impact in my life there was only one Now it's two. I wasn't able to find any negative point cause may be I'm obsessed with this.This story begin in a Cool way at least for 10 minutes you couldn't guess where this story is leading. But when you get to the point it start to move fast even though this is a 2 hours and 38 minutes of a movie or should I say an emotional masterpiece. Unlike other stories this wasn't only a Love story it's more than a Love story. And most importantly Ending defines the story. This is the first movie I that I didn't skip the end credits So that's why Sometimes I Wonder I Shouldn't Have Watched This So I Could Watch It Again....

You are king, queen, rich, poor, all are equal in front of love. Maybe I understood the meaning of love after watching this movie. This movie cannot be expressed in words. God save these people who continue to protect us as God.Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.

A great movie to watch along with your spouse or family. Romantic, has thriller elements with vintage feel. Lots of nuance twists in the story that you will appreciate as you watch the movie. Acting by everyone is great and storyline is well put and well thought. It will remain a timeless romantic classic. Watched with English subtitles as the Hindi version was not yet available(on OTT platform), even when it was a bit of a pain watching the movie with subtitles, it was worth it. Movie might be a bit stretched at some places, you might feel bored for a very very brief period for which, it losses one star (from me) otherwise its a perfect 10 on 10.I would recommend this movie anytime in place of meaningless (nowadays ) Bollywood stories/scripts.

reviews.review_title: Movie that proofs the true love
reviews.content: This moive shows the true love.It makes you fall in love with love. The innocence and purity of love which is missing in now a days romance movies is brought back. You feel joyous, elated, sad and at times you are blushing as well while watching it. Imagine that pure and sweet feeling of love that makes you feel your heart is full to overflowing with the effervescent emotions it evokes. The movie is about that love. It also shows that when you have your heart and soul filled with that love and those memories, your life still goes on as that is what your love wants for you. How ever far they are, Raam and Seetha will always unite as only they can complete each other. Rather than becoming decrepit, she celebrates her love along with fulfilling her goals and duties.No love story is complete without soulful music and eternal lyrics which was abundantly present and such perfect rendition of the songs by the singers that all the songs are going to become melodies which has not happened for a telugu movie in a very long time.
Weak story screenplay is worst.movie is moving slowly not about content only last half our watchable.dulquer Salman acting was good only one time watchboe.

reviews.review_title: So much importance given to pakistan
reviews.content: Sita Ramam is more of pakistani movie. The movie starts with a pakistani girl who hates india and the movie was about making that girl not hate india. It was so pathetic that I stopped watching at the beginning and read the story from Wikipedia. It's an outdated movie. Pakistan has been shown stronger in this movie & hero was hung by pakistan. It's just intolerable. There is no zero star option so I have one star to this movie. Film makers should grow up and stop comparing india with pakistan. India has already left pakistan far behind. If they want to compare then they should compare with China.

Lists among the bestest romantic movies of all time after Veer- Zaraa and Roja . The screenplay, the direction, the cinematography of this movie with a low budget deserve all the praises in the world. It's a timeless classic movie. Mrunal Thakur, Dulquer Salman, Rashmika Mandanna, Rukmini, Jishu Sengupta...the casting is just on point. The movie has been designed very well. The way the director made it was good. I was not able make many predictions about what might happen next on the basis of some similar movies I watched. Both D. Salman and Mrunal Thakur did their roles very well. And even Rashmika did good also. The love story was of next level . I never had a too good feel on some of romantic/love movies that I watched. But this made it. And Mrunal how beautiful she is in this movie. Oh my goodness. It's a must watch movie to those who don't know what are the values of real feelings . Even we should salute the director a movie of this kind. Anna ninag ondu namaskara anna. You should make movies of this kind. But one bad thing about the movie is it's too peotric ,but it's ok it was a good effort. Even the songs were good quite listenable. And they added feel good music to it. The telugu version Mrunal's voice dubbing was extremely good. She added a character to it. It was like what we want from the movie. About all other characters and side actors , evn they did thier role well. It is a completely watchable movie.
Very good romantic movie..still in my mind after a week of having seen the movie. The movie knows the hearts of the viewers, and it manages to captivate it through the acting and music.

Everything about this film is just amazing. It's a bliss to watch this love story on screen. Great work team. The screenplay is perfect with no deviations and edit experiments. Hanu Raghavpudi did an amazing job. Vishal Chandrasekhar's music is something not to miss. Don't miss this film in the theatres.

You don't watch this type of film everyday. What a beautiful love story with a finest climax ever! And the location, directions & acting was perfect. We can't expect more. Director & Writer is far good. Thanks for presenting this beautiful work in front of world.Mrunal was too good. She just fit in the character.Heart touching story after decades. A love story beyond everything. Specially sita ram song was the exceptional romantic one.Telegu films are getting better and better day by day. Hope we will see more finest films on upcoming days.A Fan of South Indian films from Bangladesh. Waiting eagerly to watch the Hindi version.

I literally cried in last 30 minutes of the movie. It is easy to make someone laugh through movies but it is very difficult to make someone cry through movies. This movie does both. One of the best films I have ever seen. I had seen so many classic thrillers, so many dangerous scenes; but I never cried while watching a film.Perfect casting. Perfect story. Great acting by everyone. Not a usual bollywood love story. I highly recommend this movie to everyone who has not seen it yet.I will remember this film long time. What a screenplay. The thrills, the twists all are perfectly written and acted. Finally too good.

Each and Everything is presented beautifully, and It's the best masterpiece i have ever seen, I'm so glad i took the time to see this movie, This movie is irreplaceble for me, Screenplay is in one word extraordinary, Very good romantic-emotional movie, Speechless after watching this movie, pure emotions in every aspect of the movie, story, cinematography, music everything has perfection, movie will stick on to your mind and in heart too forever after watching this, songs were perfect and the locations it was shot was beautiful, songs shows the love between ram and sita, It's a must watch movie, Loved every bit of the movie.

reviews.review_title: I really really love the film a lot 😍
reviews.content: I loved this film a lot . I can say this is the only film that I can give 10/10 because the way the director directed the film , story , hero and heroine ..... everyone in the film. Pure love story all the time . Thankyou so much the director . I never told anyone like this but this movie touched my heart and soul. Love is always painful in both the ways , sad and happy. Before watching the movie 🎥 songs didn't attract me but after I keep on listening all day. Background music is next level to the film . It triggered me water drop in my eyes . I felt very close to the film . Everyone will connect to the movie because love is universal. Also I've seen that some people gave one star 😂 I felt very sad that how can anyone give one star not even two . Now i believe all this negative feedback is because they just don't want to promote or something like that .

Clearly a masterpiece. Loved every bit of the film.The movie flow is so feel good from the beginning.The climax was awesome and the twist gives thecompletely different meaning to the movie.Excellent movie, screenplay and beautifully made.Every actor is aptly chosen and performed verywell.Dulqar Salman and Mrunal Thakur's acting is excellent;nice bgm....And No words to explain just amazing and love
it.....The theme involves POK, Kashmir, Ind Vs Pakhatred, Hindu-Muslim sentiments and all possiblecontroversial things. But everyone will get the feelgood factor only from all these controversialthings. This is the best thing and core reason forthe success of this venture.

reviews.review_title: Heart stealing epical art of love seasoned with war
reviews.content: The epical art of love seasoned with war. The emotional flow of twin hearts layered with heart stealing musics, gentle comedy, the evergreen charm of cute smile and beautiful dreams... The on-screen and offscreen presence are unbeatable and the cute expressions fills the heart with enthusiasm whereas every pain of then never missed to water our eyes. An wholesome feast of emotions that accompanies time. Heartfelt thanks to favi Dulquer, Mrunal, Rashmika, Hanurpudi, Swapna Dutt, Ashwin Dutt, Wayfarer films, Vyjayanthi movies, Lyca productions, Sony Music South, Shreyas Cinemas, Prakash Raj, GVM, Sumanth and Tharun and Vennilakishore. The movie has Dime a dozen moral takeaway beyond all these. Several information and real time situations are demonstrated for better understanding of humanity and social life. The one who miss it is like missing your heartbeat. May God bless the entire team with all the very best and protect throughout the journey of life 💐💐💐

Sita Ramam same as Titanic love 💕 story. Titanic contains romance, historical drama and emotions. In Sita Ramam have emotions, romance(true love) and historical drama. Mrunal Thakur(Sita) and Dq Salmaan(Rama) acting was so good like Kate Winslet(rose) and Leonardo DiCaprio(jack).In Sita ramam Rama was good human being. In Titanic jack was good human being, Both are died in end of the film it was heart touching. In this time Rose and Sita's situation is different but emotions are same.Sita Ramam is little different because it tells about Patriotism, religion. This movie was good so must watchable movie in a life.

All praises to all the characters. Dulqueer, Rashmika & Mrunal have done exceptional justice to the characters. All praises to the director for depicting a wonderful love story in these times. Nowadays the content is not enough if you don't have some hot scenes in movies. The affection, the trust, the eternalism and love at its purest form is very well depicted. The background score goes very well with the theme of the movie. The need for songs were just apt and timing was perfect. All the songs are good and the melody is just right. The credits go to the producer as well for believing in all. Would love to see such love stories more.

Booked the ticket with very little expectation and in the very last minute to kill time.To be honest it was out of my expectations I couldn't take off my eyes from the big screen... Hats off to the director Hanu... Dulquer did his role with perfection with his great acting skills...Rashmika did a great job too...and lastly the person who took away the centre of attraction was Mrunal thakur and her character Sita Mahalakshmi... She lit the movie up with her gorgeous looks and her acting skills... The chemistry between Ram and Seetha was captured in the best way possible and the location was also eye-catching.. I am a big fan of romantic movies and this movie left me in tears. The moment you come out of theater there will be silence around you, and your heart will feel heavy.A Must watch movie for sure❤
#sitaraman.

The movie is only just ok that it contains so much nonsense and so much regular cliches in this movie the movie in acting wise is very good but there are so much drawbacks in story and direction although movie is just good lots to improve in both direction as well as storyline. Improve in storyline needed must very much nice theme but have to be improved very much and can be improved this like of themes.Some of the scenes in movie are not at all digestible and also has the telugu fuss in the movies it has to be improved when translating movies into other languages.An orphaned soldier's life changes after he receives a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them. When he returns to her camp in Kashmir, he sends a letter to Sita that will not reach her.

Outstanding amazing emotional and many more amazing terms i want to write but it is not possible, i just want to tell you that everyone should watch this.May be i got tears just because i have love for Indian Army , But the story and the way it was expressed is outstanding, And my Tips for you is , if you are in relationship then watch it with your Partner
After this i got Crush on Mrunal Thakur yaar! And also don't forget to subscribe my youtube channel whose name is ' Naman Shivhare ' where i post summaries of long podcasts, interviews and many more i believe My content saves your precious time.
Must watch movie in 2022. Music and screenplay is is excellent. Lead pair performance is best. It's masterpiece movie. Good BGM. People who loves SSRS songs.. Thanks to Vyjayanthi movies.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, it's too short a word for this movie.
reviews.content:
I don't have words to praise this film, Best Direction, Best Performance, Best Casting, Best Storyline. All I can say about this film is less, no nudity. You can watch with the whole family.Dil ko chhu jaye is such a film, you must have seen such a romantic film after a long time.While watching this film, even for a moment, I did not feel like going anywhere in front of the screen. I realized this after a long time, I am very sad that I could not see this film in theatres.But I assure you, that you will get lost in the characters of this film. Very cute and
What a great performance very beautifully done without any vulgar antics.

Never have I seen such a pure love story. DQ, Mrunal, Rashmika has truly lived their characters. The songs, the bgm during interval was very soothing to the ears. Kudos to the Sita Ramam team for presenting such a visual treat!

reviews.review_title: Poetic tale of Love : Pure Magic on screen
reviews.content:
A movie that should be appreciated with your heart. This proves that the Cinema is not about the language or Industry(Tollywood,bollywood,sandlwood etc.,)its just the art of showing what the director had in mind for us to see.I have watched all the movies of Hanu Sir, he have the talent to make audience cry. But this movie every scene in the movie is like a painting and every dialogue is like a poem.Performance of the star cast is picture perfect. As the movie starts you no longer see Dulquer Salman & Mrunal Thakur on screen its just Sita & Ram & the magic of Sita Ramam.Music: Vishal Chandrashekar - KGVPG & PPLM are still in my playlist for any mood. But Sita Ramam music is on another level to all this albums. Best Suited for the movie & the characters. Every song have such a poetic lyrics & Singers gave life to them, Vintage cinematography. CLASSIC BGMIt is not just a love story but it touches so many other qualities."Desham Kosam Yuddham Chesevadu Sainikudu
Dharmam Kosam Yuddham Chesevadu Ramudu"I still have so much to say but i'm not finding proper sentences to appreciate the movie that will explain how it felt to watch it.Guys., one request just because your fav Hero & heroin are not part of such a classic or someone you hate is in the casting don't give negative ratings & Comments here.Even if one person is not going to movie because of such hatred its not the loss to production team but the audience who will miss to see it on big screen.Thank you @Vyjayanthi movies for making such a master piece. Its been years that Tollywood have seen such amazing story which is delivered in such a great way.I created new imdb account just to give rating to this movie. Please do watch the movie on BIG SCREEN.Don't believe any negative comments. I wish it was made a PAN INDIA movie to reach more audience (as there are many people who might not manage with subtitles).MOVIE OF THE DECADE.Thank you!
What a film it was outstanding. Each and every minute you fell in love with ram and sita.dq and mrunal lives in the characters.don't miss this beautiful story in theaters.

I don't what people get by spreading negativity over a film, and these are the ones who haven't even know what's the experience one get by watching this classical once in lifetime movie
Simple one line review for this movie don't miss this masterpiece in theatres.

Romance is back.Mrunal and Dulquer's chemistry and pair is awesome. Songs are good.Hanu Raghavpudi Sir fallen in love with your work. We gave us a masterpiece.

Dear ram garu,
I want to write a letter to you but i dont know how to send the letter to you so i'm writing it as a review to you. What an amazing movie sir. Sita meku nenu bharayya antu rasina oka uttaram me mokam lo veyi poorinam velugulu kanipinachayi. Edi meku vinadaniki konchem cosy ga unna edi nijam naku me mokam lo kanipainchidi. Sita ga murnal perfect sir. Meru edaru chesina e movie youth ki chala inspiration echindi, mainly naku dq sir i have written a lot letters for you and sita garu but i dont know to send it. Director Hanu sir we want more movies from you i hope we will see another movie with same combo actors. Guys watch SITARAMAM amazing movie. Love+inspiration+ patriotism+sacrifice+affection+magical music+comedy mainly dailogues = SITARAMAM.Ettulu
your fan mannu.

reviews.review_title: This is once in a lifetime movie!
reviews.content: This is a one of the movies you will watch any day any number of times. And only certain movies make people wish others watch in theatres or atleast on OTT! This one made me watch in Theatre after watching on OTT! It is so beautiful that I am writing a review without spoilers the night I watched it before I sleep!You can say you predicted the story its cringy, cliche simple story whatever!But the way its made and the way the plot is narrated the story unflolds the visual grandeur, music, emotions, love, patriotism, mythology references, countries in rivalry and war, terrorism, communal harmony, well this movie has it all in the 3 Michelin Star perfection of a dish! With everyone from director, music director, director of photography, art director, lyricist, singers, entire crew and cast everyone has worked as though they are 3 Michelin Star rated Chefs in their department and roles! Kudos to the production houses, distributors, channel partners, exhibitors everyone who made this happen!Watch and you will have tears of joy!

This is one of the best movies in its genre. The story line is beautifully forged and engaging from start to end. The visual beauty is very pleasing to the eyes, all the characters have did their roles nicely!

It's a movie which is going to stay with you. I felt like I am watching veer zara (my favorite movie) . A well made periodic drama with lots of surprises which will lead you to cry, lots of pure romantic scenes too which will fill your heart.. A very beautifully stitched romantic emotional movie which is definitely going to be listed in the classics in the future..Songs, mrinal's acting at some points & the first half could be better..
I hope it may teach my generation how pure love should be..& it will also teach Bollywood's nibbas what kind of film should be made.. Totally loved it.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of romance genre but this movie is epic
reviews.content: I rarely appreciate the storyline and screenplay of romance genre movie but this movie is really an evergreen movie for generations to come. Would definitely recommend this movie to everyone, excellent choice of actors - DS, Mrunal Thakur and RM. All the supporting actors justified their acting and presence.The overall plot and narratives were good. Bringing to life the 60s and 80s would have been very challenging but it was really vivid.Showing the necessity of unconditional love, patriotism, and humanity above all was the main take away i understood from the movie.Please watch it you like slow moving but content and romance oriented movie.

Hats off to maker for making movie on true love which transcends time and spaceRam is Heart of the film
Seetha is Soul of the film.Music really given much need feel to the storyCinematography added perfect vibe.

I was involved in the story. Movie was simply superb and music is too good. I suggest everyone to experience this movie in theaters. Mrunal is so beautiful in saree and she nailed her character in movie.

DQ as always running the show.. Mrunal was beautiful and stunning.. Rashmika played her part very well... Overall must watch. It is safe to say that South Indian movies are reviving the romantic genre that was killed by Bollywood. It was a total cinematic experience with comparatively low budget. Artwork and songs also hit the point which enhances the theatre experience. Going back time is something DQ is exceptionally good at and this is the first time I'm watching Mrunal Thakur and she was so beautiful in that vintage look and Rashmika is cute as always. One down side is the movie took a bit of time in the first half to deliver the context to the audience but it is safe to say that it is worth the wait and it all came together beautifully in the second half. If you're watching it in the theatre then patience is the one thing you need. Other than that there is nothing to worry about.

I watched the movie and it's just amazing. I loved the way how dots were connected and story is divided and narrated by different different people connected to Ram and Sita.It has love story,romance,suspense, betrayal. I watched it without being biased but just wanted to see the reaction if Ram is prince Raheem of nizam and Sita is just sita. I am sure things would have gone in different way. Already I have seen movie name toofan where in Farhan is muslim and mrunal is non muslim. I loved the movie the way I loved Sita Raman. Its sad to see how people respond where muslim is hero and heroine is non muslim. I HOPE PEOPLE WILL COME OUT OF THIS MENTALITY AND SUPPORT MOVIES LIKE THIS WITHOUT BEING BIASED.

reviews.review_title: Great love story and the life struggle of a soldier.
reviews.content: The story line is too good I fell in love with the movie and watch it many times. But the problem is that it make me crying everytime I watch it.. but still my love Sita and Ram is not loosing even a little bit.. I love the Ram character and the Sita is breath taker but I will be glad if in the end the got meet each other and live their life happily.The sacrifice done by the pricess for a common man is out of the box. She waited for her Ram for her whole life. This shows that in every Yug the love of Sita and Ram is always of an extreme level, incomparable.Love you Sita and Ram. I like the movie very much.

reviews.review_title: Depicts the purest form of love
reviews.content: Depicts the purest form of love. It ll full your heart with emotions. Story makes sense of every twists. Characters are perfectly crafted . Dalquer as usual conquers everyone's heart with his performance. Mrunal's every screen presence added more colours. With an amalgamation of many aspects storytelling wins the heart. It shows romance is not dead in movies. A romantic movie not to miss in theatres. It can claim recognition in international level if distributed properly. Musical masterpiece . Visionary cinematography. Every bit of movie will make you fall in love . One of the best movies ever seen.

reviews.review_title: Simplicity, pure Love at its peak
reviews.content: I have watched a purest form of unconditional love in the movie... Too much emotions... That is what, atleast I, want to witness and I have witnessed the same in the movie... Sitaram - our idols of the treta yug are depicted very nicely in this movie... Must watch 👍Just go and watch the movie... I am sure you will love it... Despite a compelling lead performance by our hero and a great soundtrack, Forrest Gump never gets out of the shadow of its weak plot and questionable premise. No Country For Old Men's bold decision to skip music entirely pays off in spades. The eerie silence of the desert, punctuated by the brief spells of violent, up-close-and-personal sound effects of hunter and hunted, keeps you constantly on the edge of your seat. While he's fantastic whenever he's on the move, using his cool stoicism to counteract the rampaging bus, Keanu Reeves can't quite match his costar in the quiet moments of Speed, which falter under his expressionless gaze.

Golly I'm lost for words as I didn't expect the Hanu Raghavapudi directed DQ, Mrunal and Rashmika starrer Sita Ramam to be such a beautiful and poignant love story. It's better than Ok Kanmani and Charlie combined, take it from me 😁. I think what works for the film beyond the grand scale at which it's mounted is how lovable the central characters are. Their chemistry sizzles and they both sparkle on screen, so everything around them naturally becomes appealing. From the moment Rashmika, who plays an extended cameo, decides to take the plunge and help herself by helping Ram and Sita, we know Sita Ramam could become everything that Radhe Shyam promised. Each frame is like a therapy for sore eyes, such is the brilliant cinematography. Although the songs are just hummable, the BGM is truly soul stirring and there are so many epic moments in both halves that I probably need to watch this film again just to revel in them. Hanu had given a flop in his previous film Padi Padi Lechu Manasu, which although was good, was also a little overdone. So credit to DQ and Mrunal for trusting the maker in him and giving us such a poetic love story. There is also a very intelligently woven subplot featuring the fight against Pak supported Mujhahideen. The cowardice of the countries that decided to ban the film is truly astonishing though. About the lead pair: Mrunal is gorgeous and her costume designer deserves every accolade in the book. She slips into the role of Sita so easily that you really can't take your eyes off her. Dulquer brings his career best performance in the role of soldier Ram and his honest performance will leave many teary eyed. I thought he's going through an identity crisis of sorts but hell no, Sita Ramam is the best decision he's made till date. The fact that its Malayalam version was almost full in a theatre in London and that the film's growing organically among the buffs, show there's something there. Sita Ramam is not just another love story, it's an emotional, epic and eternal tale of unanswered and unfulfilled love that's sure to last the test of times and leave everyone watching, supremely satisfied.

After long time, I got to see a good love story woven in the backdrop of Indo-Pak military rivalry.First half was good, where slowly the curiosity rose, but the second half was even better.The movie script was well written, so there were no boring moments.I watched it on Anazon Prime Video, in Telugu language with English subtitles. So, understanding dialogues was no issue. But, the songs' music was so good and soothing to ears. Even the song picturisation was good.Despite being a love story, there was no vulgarity and it was indeed worth watching wirh family.Despite choosing a miltary operations' backdrop, the makers have taken care not to show any side good or bad deliberately.Almost all actors have acted well. Particularly, Dulquer Salman and Mrunal Thakur have both acted well and they make a good romantic onscreen pair.It was much better experience to see this movie, rather than watching a silly new Bollywood movie, of course.

I thought he's going through an identity crisis of sorts but hell no, Sita Ramam is the best decision he's made till date. The fact that its Malayalam version was almost full in a theatre in London and that the film's growing organically among the buffs, show there's something there. Sita Ramam is not just another love story, it's an emotional, epic and eternal tale of unanswered and unfulfilled love that's sure to last the test of times and leave everyone watching, supremely satisfied.

What a movie, Really heart touching story. It is nice to see a romance drama. Unity, and there is Sitamahalakshmi and Ram. Before his death, Afreen's grandfather gives her one last task. If she were to complete it, she will inherit his wealth. In need of some urgent money, Afreen accepts the mission and in this journey she unlearns the hatred that had been buried deep within her for her neighboring country. She learns about Ram's life, his love for his country and the gorgeous Sitamahalakshmi. Her mission is to hand over his last letter to his lover.As the film unfolds, we learn important bits and pieces of information about Ram and Sita. It comes in fragments, as it is a story that is narrated to Afreen by different people who had known Ram and Sita in the past. She learns about a person who proves every belief of hers about Indian wrong. She learns about a woman who gave it all for her love. The idea is interesting. To introduce hate first, and then reveal things that which would destroy hate from within - love, hope, dreams and more. So in that vein, Ram's life symbolises the hopes and dreams of many who want a world absent of hatred. Now, the problem arises for me personally when this very symbol of hope that the film took hours to built is destroyed within minutes. From the first letters that arrived from Sita (voiced to perfection by Chinmayi), to the last letter that Ram had penned for her, just this back and forth induces old world nostalgia. It also underlines how desperate humans were for contact in absence of all the communication devices that the world has today. The closure that Ram seeks with his last letter, the one that Sita seeks every year when she visits Kashmir in his absence, is a treasure trove that could have been explored further. Maybe then, a sad ending would be befitting of this film that aims to be a classic love story.Otherwise, I beg to differ. Do all classic love stories need to have a sad ending? I understand that they illicit emotions that are more intense, but where do we gather hope from? If the film had not thrown in certain elements, like the reds and blues, or the interfaith element, maybe I could've bought their fate. However, it is almost as if the film baits the audience into a false sense of security before it bursts their bubble. Beyond the film's visuals, what really strikes a chord is the music by Vishal Chandrasekhar. It is sweet and charming, just like the film which stops short of being a classic.But at a time when the world thrives on mega-action films with gore, blood and violence (not that I don't love it), it is nice to see a romance drama. A well-made one at that, which also fleshes out its female lead as more than a skeletal being. Sita has layers, and she is a mystery. One that Ram doesn't intend to solve, but only to enjoy. He has no intentions of changing her, her life or her choice. Sita's one worry is that her secret remains unshared with Ram. However, with his last letter, Ram gives Sita the closure that two decades of living without him couldn't. So, if sweet moments, and heartwarming hugs resulting in a heart break is not your cup of tea, give Sita Ramam a miss.

Iqrar Hone Laga Hai..Love is a set of emotions, behaviors, and beliefs with strong feelings of affection. So, for example, a person might say he or she loves his or her dog, loves freedom, or loves God. The concept of love may become an unimaginable thing and also it may happen to each person in a particular way.Love has a variety of feelings, emotions, and attitude. For someone love is more than just being interested physically in another one, rather it is an emotional attachment. We can say love is more of a feeling that a person feels for another person. Therefore, the basic meaning of love is to feel more than liking towards someone.

The radio reporter tells to the public please write and send the letters to the soldier ramu .where huge amount of letters are received by ram.but in those letters there is special attraction on an letter. A woman can write a letter to the ram like a wife but he did not understand anything because he is unmarried.so he went Hyderabad and meet the woman her name is seethaamalakshmi.they can go to datesome days.after he went to army base.in the movie the seetha us a princes Noor zahaan.

This movie is a true masterpiece.Kudos to the actors who delivered their best, The story will hold you till last.Good story, great screenplay and not but the least the climax is also good worth watching.The screenplay of the movie was shot around 1965 to 1985.After ages, I have witnessed a movie that may be compared to cult classics like Roja. Director Hanu Raghavapudi has put a stupendous effort into making this poetic romantic tale with breathtaking visuals captured by cinematographer PS Vinod sir. Every scene was nothing short of a painting with such aesthetic the production house Vyjayanthi movies did & hats off to you guys! Another important aspect has been the music & BGM by Vishal Chandrasekhar, what a classic feel from the bygone era! As came to know from his video, all the traditional instruments only were used for composing the songs and it was creating such n impact suiting to the 1960-1980 kind of feel. Choreography by Brinda master was superb.

I request you all to watch this masterpiece. This is my first review. This movie made it .This is the best Love movie I have ever seen. The screenplay , locations, cinematography and acting have made it a masterpiece movie. Within a span of 2 days I watched it 5 times. This is definitely my movie of the decade regardless of the further years. Hats off to Dulquer Salmaan and Mrunal Thakur. Currently she is my best actress and I am looking forward for her upcoming movies. This movie will definitely tremendously increase the count of female fans for Dulquer. And a Salute to the Director. This will be a life time remeberable movie for the entire team and especially for Mrunal and Dulquer. Everyone should watch this movie. You will have tears and it makes you feel...

Direction,story,dialogue,music, cinephotography... everything was top notch.... thats what we called a perfect movie... Mrunal thakur was fabulous as noor jahan as well as sita-mahalakshmi...like she was made for this role...Dulquer salmaan as lieutenant ram was too good...heart touching story of two souls...and climax scene of the movie where we broke our heart... scenes of kashmir valley shown in this movie was so beautiful cant describe in word ,Every frame in this flim is like a painting ....So far one the favourite movie till now...Epic lovestory ... once in a decade movie......must watch.

Loved every bit of the film, Cutest and emotional story...The twists sprinkled all over the film were so shuttle and merges so effectively with the plot and give unexpected surprises in unexpected turns, that's the good screenwriting part, the flashback story-telling also keeps us engaging and keeps the audience engaged & thrilled due to its nature of chasing without any chasing sequences, the romance part between the two main leads was also good, the final twist of the protagonist was nothing but magical, pretty sure nobody would've expected itOverall, it gives us a sense of feeling of having watched a memorable romantic drama after a very long time.

reviews.review_title: Thank you Sita Ramam team, it's beautiful
reviews.content:
Can't get over the movie the most beautifully done and throughout the movie you just fall in love with the characters Ram and Sita.plot is amazing.You just live through each scene. The backdrop .. year depiction the setup.. the love blossoms between the two and the climax you just feel like praying for Ram to be ther for Sita ... Such a beautiful movie..This movie deserves 10/10 nothing less. A must watch ... Truly satisfying .. one such movie in a year can compensate 20 other movies which is released and commercialised.. can't write enough thank you Dulquer salman and Mrunal T.. so well done..
No words to describe.. but a perfectly made movie!!! Thank you team Sita Ramam.it's beautiful.

Best love story movie I have seen ever. It contains a beautiful love story, unexpected twists,too much suspens, with duty of a soldier for his country. I just love this movie. The character sita mahalakhsmi is just so live .dulquer Salman's acting also perfect. This duo has performed excellent.Actually a timeless blockbuster movie. An evergreen movie. Mrunal's acting,look, expression just fire. I just in love with that character sita mahalakhsmi. Every seen picturised so beautifully and perfectly. All the songs and bgm of this movie is so awesome. Just fill us with emotions. Whole the time I was watching that I just transfered to world of sita ramam. Great..

First time I cry when I watch movie , because in my 20 year's i can't feel true love. Now I know how pure is love , mostly I don't like love movies including romantic scene before watching this movie. After I like every moment in my life. Dq and mrunal do brilliant job so I watched this movie multiple times , important thing is Vishal chandrasekhar music and bgm had big impact in this movie that connects me to sita ramam epic movie in every second ,this movie can create impact in audience mind after many years, thanks Hanu Raghavapudi sir for giving opportunity to watching this heart felt story , best movie of the decade.

This is an outstanding movie! The screenplay, cinematography & most importantly the acting of the artists are incredibly awesome to evaluate! It's a romantic story with a complete essence of thrill. Salman & Mrunal were the best fitted for the story as the deliverd their best. Mrunal thakur looks stunning in her blue saries. Most impotently how she has carried her role was way beyond describing. The glamour & modesty that the director portrayed with Mrunal are truely praisworthy. The story will cling you to the very end with a superb charmness. There will be an unending essence even after the end of the movie. A must watch movie for sure!

A Beautiful love story. Best music. You can't point a single mistake in the whole movie. A wholesome perfection. A very good comeback from the director Hanu Raghavapudi. He is known for his brilliance of work from the first movie,but unfortunately last couple of movies didn't work out for him. But this one he aced it. It's been years seeing a great love story on screen with perfectly suited lead actor and actress. Each and every frame of the movie is portrayed like a lifetime picture. I still listen to the music everyday. Vintage souls like me can't get of this movie. This movie will stay forever in my heart. Congratulations to the whole team🎉🎉

What a movie!!Sita & Ram in a periodic drama alongwith army background, sounds out of the box, isn't it? Well yes, this may sound paradox but when you watch movie, you will blown out of the mind. . All three leading characters as well as all supportive characters blended so well & there was no forceful humour, and no unwanted dance numbers. It was a pleasure to spend time with Sita Ramam.Script writing, direction as well as all actors put their 1000% to make this master piece. Loved it. Must watch to all those people who are content lover, love story movie lover, or periodic drama lover. Let me warn you I cried inconsolably at the end of the movie.

After so many years i have seen such a beautiful and emotional love story. The story screenplay direction picturisation bgm all are top notch. The effortless acting of lead pair just stole my heart. Without any vulgar seen how a love story can be presented that all director should learn from this movie . If songs department they had given more emphasis then it could have been movie of the decade . But songs are not bad also . Songs very well moulded with the story . I have no complaint about song department as movie is turned out as a absolute gem . Finally i would like to conclude that if love to watch love story, then this movie will give you immense happiness. A sure shot masterpiece and a Kohinoor as well for me .

reviews.review_title: Excellent screenplay with a serene storyline
reviews.content: One of the most placid movies I've seen in the recent past. Both Dulqaar and Mrunal were extraordinary in their own way.Each of the dots was connected with the perfect emotion and the whole story made sense in the end, unlike some cheap Bollywood Movies.General Overview: It's a fictional love story about an orphan army and Princess Noorjahan. The whole storyline develops an extremely strong character of an army who also has an empathetic heart for people. The movie starts with a mission in Kashmir to prevent the fight between Indian Hindus and Pakistani Muslims and the protagonist Dulqaar did that in his own way and the movie moves further getting the love from people all around the country receiving Tons of letters and Sitamahalaxmi'( Mrunal) is one of them and you'll find rest of the story watching the movie.

One of the best romantic story. Beautifully directed and Acted. A must watch. It's story binds you. At times you will laugh your hearts out while there are times when you will cry also. It will keep you on the edge of your seat. The music used in the background is so authentic from South Indian cinema while giving a touch to characters of the movie. The love shown in this film is very rare and lucky are those who find it. I started this movie as a time pass. But it got so interesting and lovable. I urge you to go watch this in cinemas near you. These emotions are just like what I felt watching Veer Zara.
